S06adsp70-u:25_0: bhagavān āha: tat kathaṃ subhūte idaṃ subhūte [f.
S06adsp70-u:25_1: 268a] evaṃ bhavati, yady abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ tan nāsti rūpaṃ nāsti yāvad vijñānaṃ nāsti yāvat prāptir nāpy abhisamayo nāsti yāvat sarvadharmā iti?
S06adsp70-u:26_0: āha: na ahaṃ bhagavann atra dharmeṣu kāṅkṣāmi na vicikitsāmi.
S06adsp70-u:26_1: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃ bhaviṣyanty anāgāte 'dhvani bhikṣavaḥ śrāvakayānikāḥ vā.
S06adsp70-u:26_3: evaṃ vakṣyanti. yady abhāvasvabhāvā. sarvadharmāḥ tad abhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu ko 'tra saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā,
S06adsp70-u:26_4: te saṃkleśavyavadānam ajānānā śīlavipannāś ca bhaviśyanti.
S06adsp70-u:26_5: dṛṣṭivipannāś ca bhaviṣyanty ācāravipannāś ca bhaviṣyanti.
S06adsp70-u:26_6: teṣāṃ śīlavipannānāṃ dṛṣṭivipannānām ācāravipannānāṃ tisṛṇāṃ gatīnām anyatarānyatarā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā narakā vā tiryagyonir vā yamalokā vā,
S06adsp70-u:26_7: idam apy ahaṃ bhagavann anāgatabhayaṃ saṃpaśyaṃs tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham etam arthaṃ paripṛcchāmi.
S06adsp70-u:26_8: api tu khalu bhagavann ahaṃ atra dharmeṣu na kāṅkṣami na vicikitsāmi.
S06adsp70-u:27_0: bhagavanāha: sādhu sādhu subhūte evam etad yathā vadasi. ((70))
S06adsp70-u:29_2: kam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvānām arthāya anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate?
S06adsp70-u:30_0: bhagavān āha: yathaiva subhūte abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās (AdSPG II 9) tathaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate.
S06adsp70-u:30_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? kṣudraka subhūte upalaṃbhaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:30_2: na upalaṃbhasaṃjñinaḥ prāptir na abhisamayo na anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:31_0: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann anupalaṃbhasya prāptir vā abhisamayo vā anuttarā vā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
S06adsp70-u:32_0: bhagavān āha: anupalaṃbha eva subhūte prāptir anupalaṃbho 'bhisamayaḥ anupalaṃbha eva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ dharmadhātvavikopitatvām upādāya.
S06adsp70-u:32_1: dharmadhātuṃ sa icched vikopayituṃ yo 'nupalaṃbhasya prāptiṃ vā abhisamayo vā anuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim icchet.
S06adsp70-u:33_0: āha: yadi bhagavann anupalaṃbhasya na prāptir na abhisamayo na anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:33_1: anupalaṃbha eva prāptir anupalaṃbha eva abhisamayo 'nupalaṃbha eva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:33_2: tat kutaḥ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamā bhūmiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:33_3: kuto divitīyā kutas tritīyā kuto yāvad daśamī bhūmi kuto 'nutpattikadharmakṣānti.
S06adsp70-u:33_4: kuto vipākīyā abhijñā kuto vipākīyaṃ dānaṃ kuto vipākīyaṃ śīlaṃ kuto vipākīyā kṣānti kuto vipākīyaṃ vīryaṃ kuto vipākīyaṃ dhyānaṃ kuto vipākīyā prajñā,
S06adsp70-u:33_5: yatra sthitvā vipākīyeṣu dharmeṣu sattvān paripācayati.
S06adsp70-u:33_7_0: buddhāṃś ca bhagavata upatiṣṭhati annena pānena vastrair gandhair mālyai śayanenāsanena
S06adsp70-u:33_7_1: upāśrayeṇa prājīvikeṇa yāvad anyatarābhir mānuṣikībhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ tāś ca asya nācchedyante.
S06adsp70-u:33_8: yāvat parinirvṛtasya śarīreṣu śrāvakeṣu ca vipāka kṛtvā na kṣīyate.
S06adsp70-u:34_0_0: bhagavān āha: yata eva subhūte anupalaṃbhas tata eva prathamā bhūmir yāvad daśamī
S06adsp70-u:34_0_1: bhūmiḥ tata eva vipākīyāḥ pañca abhijñāḥ tata eva vipākīyan dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣānti vīryaṃ
S06adsp70-u:34_0_2: dhyānaṃ prajñā tata eva (AdSPG II 10) vipākīyāni kuśalamūlāni yaiḥ kuśalamūlai.
S06adsp70-u:34_1: sattvānām arthaṃ karoti. yāvat parinirvṛtasya api pūjā:
S06adsp70-u:35_0: āha: anupalaṃbhasya ca bhagavan dānasya ca śīlasya ca kṣantyāś ca vīryasya ca samādheś ca prajñāyāś ca abhijñānāṃ ca ko viśeṣaḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ?
S06adsp70-u:36_0: bhagavān āha: anupalaṃbhasya ca subhūte dānasya ca śīlasya ca kṣanteś [f.
S06adsp70-u:36_1: 268b] ca vīryasya ca samādheś ca prajñāyāś ca abhijñānāṃ ca na kiṃcin nānākaraṇaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:36_2: yat punaḥ subhūte anupaliptaṃ dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣānti vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñābhijñā ca,
S06adsp70-u:37_0: āha: kathaṃ punar bhagavann anupaliptasya dānasya yāvad abhijñānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ nirdiśyate?
S06adsp70-u:38_0_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupalabhya
S06adsp70-u:38_0_1: dānam anupalabhya tyāgam anupalabhya dāyakam anupalabhya pratigrāhakaṃ dānaṃ dadāti
S06adsp70-u:38_5: anupalabhya abhijñā abhijñāṣu carati anupalabhya smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati.
S06adsp70-u:38_13: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalaṃbhaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:38_14: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:38_15: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durādharṣo bhavati māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:40_0: (VII a) evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:40_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ekacittena ṣaṭpāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:40_2_0: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
S06adsp70-u:40_2_1: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni caturarddhipādān pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāny
S06adsp70-u:40_2_2: āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni catvāry āryasatyāni aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattī
S06adsp70-u:40_4: catasra pratisaṃvido mahāmaitriṃ mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān dvātṛṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny aśītim anuvyañjanāni parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp70-u:41_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yad dānaṃ dadāti tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_1: yac chīlaṃ rakṣati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_2: ya /// kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_3: yad vīryam ārabhate tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ yan samādhiṃ samāpadyate tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parihgṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_4: yat prajñāṃ bhāvayati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_5: yad dhyānāni samāpadyate tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_6: yad apramāṇāni samāpadyate tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_7: yāvad ārūpyasamāpattīn samāpadyate tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_8: yat smṛtyupasthānāni samāpadyate tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_9: yāvad yad āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_12: yac catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_13: yad aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīn bhāvayati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_16: yad adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_17: yad daśatathāgatabalāni bhāvayati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_20: yal lakṣaṇāni yad aśītim anuvyañjanāni abhinirhārati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:41_21: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ekacittotpādena ṣaṭpāramitān parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:42_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ekacittotpādena ṣaṭpāramitā parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:43_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yad dānaṃ dadāti tat prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:43_1: yac chīlaṃ rakṣati tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:43_2: yat kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:43_3: yad vīryam ārabhate tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:43_4: yad samādhiṃ bhāvayati tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:43_5: yat prajñāṃ bhāvayati tatra na dvayasaṃjñī bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:44_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:45_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06adsp70-u:45_1: sa tatra dānapāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭpāramitā antargatā kṛtvā dānan dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:45_2: evaṃ sarvabodhipakṣyān dharmān paripūrayati yāvat sa tatra mārge sarvāḥ ṣaṭpāramitā antargatā kṛtvā mārgaṃ bhāvayati.
S06adsp70-u:45_3: tat punaḥ katham iti? yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānan dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:45_5: sa tatra anāsrave citte sthito nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:45_6: ko dadāti kasmai vā dadāti. kena vā dadāti ko vā dadāmi. sa nimittāpagatena cittena dānaṃ dadāty anāsraveṇa vigatatṛṣṇena vigatāvidyena,
S06adsp70-u:45_8: tad dānaṃ na samanupaśyati. yāvat sarvabuddhadharmeṣu kartavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:45_9: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena śīlaṃ rakṣati.
S06adsp70-u:45_12: evaṃ nimittāpagatena (AdSPG II 13) cittena kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati.
S06adsp70-u:45_21: nimittāpagatena cittena prajñāṃ bhāvayati tāṃ ca prajñāṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:45_23: nimittāpagatena cittena catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati yāvad aśīty anuvyañjaneṣu kartavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:46_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavann animitteṣv anabhisaṃskāreṣu sarvadharmeṣu dānapāramitāparipūrir bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:46_1_1: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahaṇānāṃ caturṇāṃs ṛddhipādānāṃ pañcānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:46_1_2: indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṃgasya mārgasya paripūrir
S06adsp70-u:46_2_0: śūnyatāyā ānimittasya [f. 269b] apraṇihitasya samādhe. paripūrir bhavati. daśatathāgatabalānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:46_2_1: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidānāṃ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇāyā aṣṭādaśānām
S06adsp70-u:47_0_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nimittāpagatena cittena dānaṃ dadāty
S06adsp70-u:47_0_1: annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo yānaṃ yānārthikebhya yāvad anyatarānyatarān
S06adsp70-u:47_0_2: mānuṣyakān pariṣkārānn ādhyātmikaṃ vā aṅgapratyaṅgāni bāhyaṃ vā bhāryaputraduhitrīrāyjaṃ
S06adsp70-u:47_1: yācanakebhyas, tasya kaścid evāgamya evaṃ vadet kim anenedṛśena dānena dattenaivaṃ nirupakāreṇa,
S06adsp70-u:47_2: tasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ evaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:47_3: kiṃ cāpi me sattvā evaṃ paribhāṣante.
S06adsp70-u:47_5: atha ca punar dātavyam eva mayā dānaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:47_6: na mayā dānaṃ na? dātavyaṃ. sa tad dānaṃ sarvasattvai sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp70-u:47_7: sa tathā pariṇāmayati yathā pariṇāmayan nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:47_8: kiṃ vā dānam ekasmai vā dadāmi,
S06adsp70-u:47_9: kena vā dadāmi ko vā dadāti. (AdSPG II 14) kiṃ vā pariṇāmayāmi.
S06adsp70-u:47_10: kva vā pariṇāmayāmi. kena vā pariṇāmayāmi. ko vā pariṇāmayati. sa tad vastun na samanupaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:47_11: yad vā dadyād yatra vā dattvā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet.
S06adsp70-u:47_12_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? sarvaṃ vastv adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ bahirddhāśūnyatayā śūnyam
S06adsp70-u:47_12_1: adhyātmabahirddhāśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ mahāśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatayā
S06adsp70-u:47_12_2: śūnyam asaṃskṛtaśūnyatayā śūnyam atyantaśūnyatayā śūnyam anavarāgraśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:47_13: avakāraśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:47_14: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ. sa evaṃ saṃpaśyati kva vā pariṇāmayiṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:47_15: kiṃ vā pariṇāmayiṣyati. kena vā pariṇāmayiṣyati, tenaivaṃ pariṇāmayatā pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:47_16: sa sattvāṃs ca paripācayati. buddhakṣetraṃ ca parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:47_18_0: śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yāvat
S06adsp70-u:47_18_1: saptatṛṃśato bodhipakṣyān dharmān śūnyatām ānimittam apraṇihitaṃ samādhiṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikān
S06adsp70-u:47_20: vipākaṃ ca na parigṛhṇāti. tadyathāpi nāma paranirmitavaśavarttināṃ devānāṃ manasa eva sarvopakaraṇasaṃpadaḥ prādurbhavanty,
S06adsp70-u:47_21: evam eva tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya manasa eva sarvopakaraṇasaṃpadaḥ prādurbhavanti.
S06adsp70-u:47_22: sa tena dānena buddhāṃś ca bhagavata upatiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:47_23: sa devamānuṣya asuraṃ ca lokaṃ saṃtarpayati.
S06adsp70-u:47_24: sa tān sattvāṃś tayā dānapāramitayā parigṛhya upāyakauśalena ca triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:47_25: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nimittāpagatena cittena dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06adsp70-u:47_26: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvac chīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃc chīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06adsp70-u:47_27: sa āryam anāsravaṃ mārgaparyāpannaṃ dharmatāprātilaṃbhikaṃ śīlaṃ pratilabhate.
S06adsp70-u:47_28: tat punar asya śīlam akhaṇḍaṃ bhavaty acchidram akalmāṣam aparāmṛṣṭaṃ bhujiṣyaṃ susamāhitaṃ vijñapraśastaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:47_29: tena ca śīlena na kaṃcid dharmaṃ parāmṛśati.
S06adsp70-u:47_30: rūpaṃ vā vedanāṃ vā saṃjñāṃ vā saṃskārān vā vijñānaṃ vā (AdSPG II 15) dvātṛṃśatāṃ vā mahāpuruṣalaksaṇāni kṣatriyamahāsālakulāni vā brāhmaṇamahāsālakulāni vā [f.
S06adsp70-u:47_31_0: 270a] gṛhapatimahāsālakulāni cāturmahārājikāṃ vā devās trayastriṃśatkāyikān vā yāmān
S06adsp70-u:47_31_1: vā tuṣitāṃ vā nirmaṇaratīṃ vā paranirmitavaśavarttino vā brahmakāyikāṃ vā brahmapurohitāṃ
S06adsp70-u:47_31_2: vā brahmapāriṣadyāṃ vā parīttāṃ vā apramāṇāṃ vā ābhāsvarāṃ vā pariśubhān vā apramāṇaśubhān
S06adsp70-u:47_31_3: vā śubhakṛtsṇān vā bṛhatphalān vā asaṃjñikān vā aspṛhān vā atapān vā sudṛśān vā sudarśanān
S06adsp70-u:47_34: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:47_35: pratyekabuddhaṃ vā cakravartīrājyādhipatyaṃ vā kārayeyam ity,
S06adsp70-u:47_36: anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvā sarvākārajñātāyāṃ pariṇāmayaty,
S06adsp70-u:47_39: tayā ca śīlapāramitayā paripūritayā upāyakauśalena ca catvāri dhyānāny utpādayaty anāsvādayayogena.
S06adsp70-u:47_41: yena divyena cakṣuṣā vainayikena ye pūrvasyān diśi buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti tāṃś ca paśyati.
S06adsp70-u:47_44: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ yāvad ye samantād daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti tāṃś ca paśyati.
S06adsp70-u:47_47: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhena atikrānta mānuṣeṇa teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bhāṣamaṇānāṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti.
S06adsp70-u:47_48: tac ca śrutaṃ tāvan na naśyati.
S06adsp70-u:47_49: yāvan na tena śrutena ātmanaḥ ca parasya ca arthaḥ kṛto bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:47_50: cetaḥparyāyajñānena ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:47_51: tena ca cetaḥparyāyajñānena sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06adsp70-u:47_52: pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena ca teṣāṃ sattvānām atītāni kuśalamūlāny ājñāya tai kuśalamūlais
S06adsp70-u:47_53: tāṃ sattvāṃ saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati,
S06adsp70-u:47_54: te tathā samādāpitāyā ca tathā saṃpraharṣitāyā viśeṣagāmino bhavanty,
S06adsp70-u:47_55: āsravakṣayajñānena ca sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati yāvad arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:47_58: evaṃ yāvad yatra yatra sattvāḥ pratibalāḥ bhavanti kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tatra tatra pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:47_59: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nimittāpagatena cittena śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06adsp70-u:48_0_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte ānimitteṣv anābhogeṣv anupalaṃbheṣv anabhisaṃskāreṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipāramitāṃ
S06adsp70-u:48_0_1: paripūrayati? iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya
S06adsp70-u:48_0_2: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya sacet sarvasattvā āgamya āgamya loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān
S06adsp70-u:48_0_3: dadyus tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ekacittotpādasya api kṣobhasahagatasya avakāśo
S06adsp70-u:48_1: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dve kṣāntī bhāvayitavye.
S06adsp70-u:48_2: katame dve? yac ca sarvasattvānāṃ mayā kṣāntavyam ākrośaparibhāṣaloṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahāram iti.
S06adsp70-u:48_3: yā ca anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir utpādayitavyā.
S06adsp70-u:48_4: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ākruśyamānena vā paribhāṣyamāṇena vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahāreṣu dīyamāneṣv evaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:48_5: ko me ākrorśati vā paribhāṣyate vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān vā dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:48_6: kasya vā dadāti. tena dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:48_7: sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmān eva nopalapsyate kutaḥ punar dharmaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:48_8: [f. 27Ob] svabhāvaṃ, tasya dharmasvabhāvaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya evaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:48_9: ko me chinnatti vā bhinnatti vā.
S06adsp70-u:48_10: sa evaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmasvabhāvam anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilapsyate.
S06adsp70-u:48_12: kim iti: kleśānutpattikatā ca jñānānācchedyatā ca.
S06adsp70-u:48_13: so 'nayo dvayo kṣāntyau sthitvā catvāri dhyānāni paripūrayiṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:48_14_0: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ
S06adsp70-u:48_14_1: mārgaṃ trini vimokṣamukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06adsp70-u:48_15: sa eṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā āryeṣv anāsraveṣu lokottareṣv asādhāraṇeṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sārdhaṃ tataḥ āryā abhijñā paripūrayiṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:48_16: yābhir abhijñābhiḥ paripūrṇābhiḥ ṣaḍbhiś ca pāramitābhiḥ samudāgacchati,
S06adsp70-u:48_17: anāsraveṣu ca pañcasv abhijñāsu (AdSPG II 17) sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhān bhagavanto drakṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:48_18: tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavato dṛṣṭvā buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilapsyate.
S06adsp70-u:48_19: tasya sā buddhānusmṛtir nocchetsyate yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp70-u:48_21: sa divyena śrotradhātunā yan teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bhāṣitaṃ tat sarvam udgrahīṣyaty udgṛhya tathatvāya sattvānān dharman deśayiṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:48_22: sa teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittam ājñāsyati.
S06adsp70-u:48_23: sa tena cittaparyāyajñānena sarvasattvānāṃ cetasaiva cittam ājñāyata tathatvāya dharman deśayiṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:48_24_0: pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena. teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlān ājñāya tāṃ paurvakeṇa kuśalamūlena
S06adsp70-u:48_24_1: saṃharṣayiṣyati samādāpayiṣyati āsravakṣayajñānena ca tāṃ sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu niveṣayiṣyati
S06adsp70-u:48_25_0: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvān
S06adsp70-u:48_25_1: paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrya
S06adsp70-u:48_26: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate.
S06adsp70-u:49_0_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣv anābhogeṣv
S06adsp70-u:49_0_1: anupalaṃbheṣv aprādurbhāveṣv anabhisaṃskāreṣu dharmeṣu vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06adsp70-u:49_0_2: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kāyikena eva vīryeṇa
S06adsp70-u:49_3: sa caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannaḥ anekavidham ṛddhividhiṃ pratyanubhavati,
S06adsp70-u:49_4: yāvat sūryacandramasau pāṇinā parāmṛśaty ā brahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśavarttayati.
S06adsp70-u:49_5: tena kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto viharanty anekaśatasātasāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarddhyā gatvā buddhān bhagavataḥ upatiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:49_7: tasya te cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārās tāvan na kṣīyante yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyate.
S06adsp70-u:49_8: abhisaṃbuddhabodheś (AdSPG II 18) ca sadevamānuṣāsuro lokaḥ sukhī bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:49_11: tenaiva carddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa gatvā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti.
S06adsp70-u:49_12: so ca yathā śruto na jātu vipranaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:49_14: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca parigṛhṇāti sarvākārajñatāyā caran.
S06adsp70-u:49_15: evaṃ khalu subhūte [f. 271a] bodhisattvo mahāsattva kāyikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06adsp70-u:49_16_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ āryeṇa
S06adsp70-u:49_16_1: anāsraveṇa mārgeṇa mārgaparyāpannena vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp70-u:49_16_2: mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ akuśalasya kāyakarmaṇo
S06adsp70-u:49_16_3: 'vakāśaṃ na dadāty akuśalasya vākkarmaṇo 'vakāsaṃ na dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:49_17: na parāmṛśati. nityam iti vā anityam iti vā sukham iti vā duḥkham iti vā ātmeti vā anātmeti vā saṃskṛtam iti vā asaṃskṛtam iti vā.
S06adsp70-u:49_18: kāmadhātuṃ vā rūpadhātuṃ vā ārūpyadhātuṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:49_20: prathamadhyānaṃ vā yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:49_21: maitriṃ vā karuṇāṃ vā muditāṃ vā upekṣāṃ vā ākāśānantyāyāyatanaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:49_22_0: yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ vā smṛtyupasthānāni vā samyakprahāṇāni vā ṛddhipādān
S06adsp70-u:49_22_1: vā indriyāṇi vā balāni vā bodhyaṅgāni vā āryāṣṭaṅgaṃ mārgaṃ vā śūnyatāṃ vā ānimittaṃ
S06adsp70-u:49_22_2: vā apraṇihitaṃ vā yāvad buddhadharmān vā na parāmṛśati.
S06adsp70-u:49_23_0: nityā iti vā anityā iti vā sukham iti vā duḥkham iti vā ātmeti vā anātmeti vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06adsp70-u:49_23_1: vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā bodhisattvatvaṃ
S06adsp70-u:49_24: ime sattvā darśanaprabhāvitā ime tanubhūmiprabhāvitā ime avarabhāgīyaprabhāvitā ime ūrdhvaṃbhāgīyaprabhāvitā.
S06adsp70-u:49_25: ime pratyekabuddhaprabhāvitā ime mārgākārajñatāprabhāvitā ime sarvākārajñatāprabhāvitā ity evam api na parāmṛśati.
S06adsp70-u:49_26: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate.
S06adsp70-u:49_28: sa tenaiva caitasikena (AdSPG II 19) vīryeṇa samanvāgato maraṇamukhe 'pi samāne sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:49_29: tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate. vīryapāramitāṃ ca paripūrayati.
S06adsp70-u:49_31: buddhadharmāṃś ca paripūrayati tāṃś ca buddhadharmān nopalabhate.
S06adsp70-u:49_32: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ nopalabhate.
S06adsp70-u:49_33: sa tena kāyikena ca caitasikena ca vīryeṇa samanvāgataḥ sarvakuśaladharmān paripūrayati.
S06adsp70-u:49_34: tatra ca na sajjati. so 'sajjamāno buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati.
S06adsp70-u:49_35: sattvānām arthaṃ kurvan, yena yenardhiprātihāryeṇecchati vikurvitum.
S06adsp70-u:49_37: yadi vā puṣpavarṣeṇa yadi vā gandhavimuñcanena.
S06adsp70-u:49_38: yadi vā gītavādyāraṃbheṇa yadi vā bhūmicālena.
S06adsp70-u:49_39: yadi vā avabhāsena: yadi vā saptaratnamayalokadhātusandarśanena.
S06adsp70-u:49_40: yatra yatra vā yauvanārthānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛte ātmānam avasṛjati.
S06adsp70-u:49_41: yadi vā jyotirandhānāṃ sattvānām arthe ātmano 'vasṛjati.
S06adsp70-u:49_42: yadi vā gandham avasṛjati. yadi vā mahāyajñān avasṛjati.
S06adsp70-u:49_47: kāṃścid dānena anugṛhṇāti. kāṃścic chīlena. kesāṃcit kṛte aṅgapratyaṅgāni parityajati.
S06adsp70-u:49_48: keṣāṃcit putradārā keṣāṃcid rājyaṃ keṣāṃcid arthe ātmānam avasṛjāti.
S06adsp70-u:49_49: eveṃ yena yenopāyena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavya tena tenopāyena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:49_50: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu caitasikena vīryeṇa samanvāgato vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06adsp70-u:50_0_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anāmanimitteṣu
S06adsp70-u:50_0_1: dharmeṣu sthitvā samādhipāramitāṃ paripūrayati? (AdSPG II 20) iha subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp70-u:50_0_2: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sthāpayitvā tathāgatasamādhiṃ tat anyāt sarvasamādhīn
S06adsp70-u:50_1: 27lb] paripūrayati. sa viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:50_2: savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp70-u:50_3: sa maitrisahagatena cittena yāvad upekṣāsahagatena cittena yāvat sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ spharitvo 'pasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp70-u:50_5: sa tatra samādhipāramitāyāṃ sthitvāṣṭau vimokṣān anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
S06adsp70-u:50_6: navānupūrvasamāpattīṃ śūnyatāṃ samādhim ānimittaṃ samādhim apraṇihitaṃ samādhim upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp70-u:50_8: vidyutopamaṃ samādhiṃ samyaksamādhiṃ vajropamaṃ samādhim upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp70-u:50_9: sa iha samādhipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā saptatṛṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyān dharmān upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp70-u:50_10_0: sa iha samādhipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā mārgākārajñatājñānena yāvan mārgākārajñatāyāṃ sarvasamādhīn
S06adsp70-u:50_10_1: antargatān dṛṣṭvā śuklavipaśyanābhūmim atikramya gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ
S06adsp70-u:50_10_2: tanubhūmiṃ vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvibhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramya bodhisattvanyāmam
S06adsp70-u:50_11: buddhabhūmiṃ paripūrayati. so 'tra ca bhūmiṣu carati. na ca antareṇa phalaṃ ca anuprāpnoti.
S06adsp70-u:50_13: so 'tra samādhipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati.
S06adsp70-u:50_15: sa tān buddhān bhagavata. paryupāste teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike kuśalamūlam avaropayati.
S06adsp70-u:50_16: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06adsp70-u:50_18: sattvānāṃ ca arthaṃ karoti. kāṃścit sattvān dānena anugṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:50_19: kāṃścic chīlena, kāṃścit kṣāntyā kāṃścid vīryeṇa kāṃścit samādhinā kāṃścit prajñayā kāṃścid vimuktyā kāṃścid vimuktijñānadarśanena,
S06adsp70-u:50_21: kāṃścit sakṛdāgāmiphale kāṃścid anāgāmiphale kāṃścid arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:50_24: yair yaiḥ kuśalamūlair dharmaiḥ sattvā udgacchanti tatra niyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:50_25: sa iha samādhipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny (AdSPG II 21) abhinirharati.
S06adsp70-u:50_28: sa na jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyate.
S06adsp70-u:50_29: na jātu kāmān pratisevate, na ca kācid upapattir yāṃ na pratigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:50_30: na copapattidoṣeṇa lipyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy anena māyopamā dharmāḥ sudṛṣṭā bhavanti.
S06adsp70-u:50_31: sa māyopamān sarvasaṃskārān viditvā sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:50_32: na ca tatra sattvān na sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:50_33: so 'nupalabhamāna sarvadharmā anupalaṃbha eva sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayati lokavyavahāratām upādāya na punaḥ paramārthena.
S06adsp70-u:50_34: sa iha samādhipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṣu carati.
S06adsp70-u:50_35: na ca jātu samādhipāramitāyā virahito bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:50_37: sa iha mārgākārajñatāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatām abhinirharati.
S06adsp70-u:50_39: sarvavāsanānusandhiṃ prahāya ātmanaś ca parasya ca arthaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:50_40: sa ātmanaś ca parasya ca arthaṃ kurvan sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyo bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:50_41: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran samādhipāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06adsp70-u:51_0: (VII 2) kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā ānimitteṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati? iha [f.

S06adsp70-u:78_15: na māyā na māyādarśī, na marīcika na marīcikadarśī.
S06adsp70-u:78_16: na nirmitaṃ na nirmitā. api tu khalu sarva ete dharmā avastukā abhāvasvabhāvās,
S06adsp70-u:78_18: adhātuṣu dhātusaṃjñina. anāyataneṣv āyatanasaṃjñina. api tu khalu pratītyasamutpannā ete sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitā karmavipākaparigṛhītā.
S06adsp70-u:78_19: kiṃ punar yūyam atra avastukeṣu dharmeṣu vastusaṃjñino bhavata.
S06adsp70-u:78_20: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena ye matsariṇaḥ sattvās tān matsaryād vinivartya dānapāramitāyāṃ niyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:78_22: sa tāṃś tataḥ uccālya śīlapāramitāyāṃ niyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:78_26: evaṃ prathamā dhyānā dvitīye dhyāne dvitīyā dhyānā tṛtīye dhyāne.
S06adsp70-u:78_30: sa tato hīnād dānād dānaphalāc ca anekaparyāyeṇa vivecya anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātav āśvāsayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:78_31: sa tataḥ śīlāc ca śīlaphalāc ca anekaparyāyeṇa vivecya anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:78_32: sa tataḥ samādheś ca samādhiphalāc ca anekaparyāyeṇa vivecya anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:78_33_0: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv iddhipādeṣu pañcasv indriyeṣu
S06adsp70-u:78_33_1: pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge mārge triṣu vimokṣamukheṣv aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu
S06adsp70-u:78_33_2: navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu
S06adsp70-u:78_33_3: mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyām aṣṭādaśaṣv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv aśvāsayati niveśayati
S06adsp70-u:78_34: sa ebhir anāsravair dharmair arūpibhir anidarśanair apratighair ye srotaāpattiphalaṃ prārthayanti tān (AdSPG II 37) srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:78_35: yāvad ye 'rhattvaṃ prārthayanti tān arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:78_36: ye pratyekabodhiṃ prārthayanti tān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:78_37: ye 'nuttarāṃsamyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayanti teṣāṃ bodhimārgam ācaṣṭe upadiśati samuttejayati.
S06adsp70-u:78_38: saṃpraharṣayati. pratiṣṭhāpayati, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran svapnopamānāṃ [f.
S06adsp70-u:78_39: 277a] sarvadharmāṇām avastukānām abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:79_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:79_1_0: āścaryam idaṃ bhagavann adbhutadharmo yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:79_2: ime kuśalā dharmā ime akuśalā dharmā ime sāsravā dharmā ime anāsravā dharmāḥ yāvad ime saṃskṛtā dharmā ime asaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:80_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. āścaryam idaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām abdhutadharmo yadi iha gaṃbhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ kurvanti.
S06adsp70-u:80_1_0: sacet punas tvaṃ subhūte janīyāye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya āścaryādbhuto dharmas
S06adsp70-u:80_1_1: tatsarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhais tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na sukaraḥ pratyupakāraḥ
S06adsp70-u:80_2: na yuṣmābhiḥ sarvair api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyaṃ sa dharmo 'bhibhavituṃ.
S06adsp70-u:81_0: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya abdhutadharma yaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ na saṃvidyate?
S06adsp70-u:82_0: bhagavān āha: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭu ca manasikuru,
S06adsp70-u:82_1_0: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te. iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vipākīyāsu
S06adsp70-u:82_1_1: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā pañcasu ca abhijñāsu saptatṛṃśati ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu
S06adsp70-u:82_1_2: dhāraṇīmukheṣu samādhimukheṣu ca daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu
S06adsp70-u:82_1_3: pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyām aṣṭādaśaṣv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sthitvā
S06adsp70-u:82_1_4: diśvidikṣu lokadhātūṃ gatvā ye sattvā dānena (AdSPG II 38) anugrahītavyās tān dānena
S06adsp70-u:82_2_0: ye śīlena ye kṣāntyā ye vīryeṇa ye samādhinā ye prajñayā ye prathamena dhyānena ye
S06adsp70-u:82_2_1: dvitīyena ye tṛtīyena ye caturthena ye ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattyā vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattyā
S06adsp70-u:82_3: ye maitryānugrahītavyās tāṃ maitryānugṛhṇāti ye karuṇayā ye muditayā ye upekṣayānugrahītavyās tān upekṣayānugṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:82_4_0: ye caturṣu smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir iddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir
S06adsp70-u:82_4_1: indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṃgena mārgeṇānugrahītavyā
S06adsp70-u:82_4_2: ye śūnyatayā samādhinā ye ānimittena samādhinā ye apraṇihitena samādhinā anugrahītavyās
S06adsp70-u:83_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānena sattvān anugṛhṇāti?
S06adsp70-u:84_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāty,
S06adsp70-u:84_1: annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo mālyaṃ mālyārthikebhyaḥ gandhaṃ gandhārthikebhyo vilepanaṃ vilepanārthikebhyo:
S06adsp70-u:84_2: vastraṃ vastrārthikebhyaḥ śayyāsanaṃ śayyāsanārthikebhyo yāvad anyatarānyatarāṃ manuṣyakāṃ pariṣkārān dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:84_4: tathaiva pratyekabuddhebhyo 'rhadbhyo 'nāgāmibhyaḥ sakṛdāgāmibhyaḥ srotaāpannebhyaḥ samyaggatebhyaḥ samyakpratipannebhyaḥ tathaiva manuṣyabhūtebhya.
S06adsp70-u:84_5: tathaiva tiryagyonigatebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ anānātvasaṃjñām upasthāpya dānaṃ dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:84_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāpy anānātvaṃ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:84_7: so 'nānātvaṃ dānaṃ dattvā anānātvasya dharmasya lābhī bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:84_8: yaduta sarvākārajñatāyā. sacet punar subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tiryagyonigataṃ [f.
S06adsp70-u:84_9: 277b] prāṇikam adakṣiṇīyaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittam utpadyeta,
S06adsp70-u:84_10: samyaksaṃbuddho me dakṣiṇīyo na tiryagyonigata iti.
S06adsp70-u:84_11: na bodhisattvadharmo bhavet. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam utpādy evam anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthita,
S06adsp70-u:84_12_0: ime mayā (AdSPG II 39) sattvā dānena anugrahītavyā ime na anugrahītavyā te dānena
S06adsp70-u:84_13: te tenaiva dānena anugṛhītā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti.
S06adsp70-u:84_14: saced bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarvo janakāyor vādhyaṃ yāceta,
S06adsp70-u:84_15: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nānyaṃ cittaṃ notpādayitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:84_16: dātavyaṃ vā na dātavyam ity, avikopitamānasena. dātavyam eva tasmai janapadakāyāyaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:84_17: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sa janapadakāyasya arthe 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:84_18: sacet punaḥ vikalpayed garhyo bhavet teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānām arhatāṃ śaikṣāṇāṃ sadevamānuṣyāsurasya ca lokasya,
S06adsp70-u:84_19: kena kilādhyīṣṭa: sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhava layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam iti.
S06adsp70-u:85_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte saced bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya manuṣyabhūto vā amanuṣyabhūto vā āgamya aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchetuṃ yāceta taṃ tadā tena na dvitīyaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:85_1: dāsye vā na dāsye vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānām arthāya saṃcintya āśrayaḥ parigrahītaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:85_2: anena me ātmabhāvena sarvasattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:85_4: yeṣām arthe mayā ātmabhāvaḥ upādattas te ayācitam eva gṛhītvā gacchatuṃ.
S06adsp70-u:85_5: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:86_0: punar apraṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:86_1: ko veha dadāti kasmai vā dīyate kiṃ vā dīyate,
S06adsp70-u:86_3: (AdSPG II 40) tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy ete dharmā atyantaśūnyatayā śūnyā.
S06adsp70-u:86_4: na hi śūnyatā kaścid dadāti vā āharate vā.
S06adsp70-u:86_5: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:86_7: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ vā śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ vā paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ vā prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ vā sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ vā yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ vā,
S06adsp70-u:86_8: sa iha śūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā yad dānaṃ dāsyati.
S06adsp70-u:86_10: so 'nayā dānapāramitayā paripūryā na adhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu cchidyamāneṣu vā bhidyamāneṣu vā evaṃ cittam utpādayiṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:86_11: na kaścit chinatti vā bhinatti vā.
S06adsp70-u:87_0_0: (VIII 5,1a). iha ahaṃ subhūte adrākṣaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati pūrvasyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:87_0_1: diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān saṃcintya mahānarakāt
S06adsp70-u:87_0_2: prapatya tāni mahānarakaduḥkāny upaśamayya tribhiḥ prātihāryais teṣāṃ nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:87_2: tāni narakaduḥkhāny upaśamayya ādeśanāprātihāryeṇa dharman deśayanty anuśāsanī [f.
S06adsp70-u:87_3: 278a] prātihāryeṇa ca. te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāmaitryā ca mahākaruṇayā ca mahāmuditayā ca mahopekṣayā ca dharman deśayanti.
S06adsp70-u:87_4: tatas te nairayikā sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antike cittaṃ prasādya tato mahānarakebhyo vyutthisthante.
S06adsp70-u:87_5: te tato mahānarakebhyo vyutthāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante.
S06adsp70-u:87_6: anupūrveṇa ca tribhiḥ prātihāryair duḥkhasya antaṃ kurvanti.
S06adsp70-u:87_7: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād anuvidikṣu lokadhātuṣu kartavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:88_0: (VIII 5,1b) yāvad iha ahaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayann adrākṣaṃ gaṅgāndīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakāni,
S06adsp70-u:88_1: tāṃs te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhān bhagavata upatiṣṭhanti tīvrayā bhaktyā priyeṇa na apriyeṇa manāpena na amanāpena gauraveṇa na agauraveṇa.
S06adsp70-u:88_2: (AdSPG II 41) yac ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante tan te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā udgṛhṇanti.
S06adsp70-u:88_3: udgṛhya dhārayanti. na jātu vipraṇāśayanti. yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyante.
S06adsp70-u:88_4: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād anuvidikṣu lokadhātūsu.
S06adsp70-u:89_0_0: iha punar ahaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayann adrākṣaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi
S06adsp70-u:89_0_1: gaṅgānadīvālukopaṃcṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tairyagyonikānāṃ sattvānām
S06adsp70-u:89_1: tatra te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā cchitvā daśasu dikṣu vikṣipanti.
S06adsp70-u:89_2: tad ye tairyagyonigatāḥ sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māṃsāni khadanti.
S06adsp70-u:89_3: te teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antike maitriṃ pratilabhante.
S06adsp70-u:89_4: te tena maitrīpratilaṃbhena tatas tiryagyone vyutthiṣṭhante.
S06adsp70-u:89_8: te teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śrutvā tathātvāya pratipadyante.
S06adsp70-u:89_10: tribhir yānaiḥ śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
S06adsp70-u:89_11: evaṃ bahukarā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittam utpādayanti.
S06adsp70-u:89_13: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhaṣṭād upariṣṭād anuvidikṣu yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati.
S06adsp70-u:90_0_0: (VIII 5,1c) iha ahaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayann adrākṣaṃ pūrvasyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:90_0_1: diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvān pretavaiṣayikānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:90_0_2: sattvānāṃ teṣu pretaviṣayeṣu yāni duḥkhāni tāni sarvāṇi pratipraśraṃbhayanti.
S06adsp70-u:90_1: tatra te pretavaiṣayikāḥ sattvās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antike maitraṃ cittam utpādya tataḥ pretayoner vyutthiṣṭhante.
S06adsp70-u:90_2: te tataḥ pretayoner vyutthāya devaloke manuṣyaloke ca upapadyante.
S06adsp70-u:90_3: na ca kadācid buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhavanti yāvan na anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtā bhavanti.
S06adsp70-u:90_5: evaṃ mahākaruṇāvihāri subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya pratyupasthito yaduta parinirvāpanārthāya.
S06adsp70-u:91_0: (VIII 5,1d) iha punar ahaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayann (AdSPG II 42) adrākṣan [f.
S06adsp70-u:91_1_0: 278b] pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvān mahāsattvāṃś
S06adsp70-u:91_1_1: cāturmahārājakāyikānān devānān dharman deśayantas trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ yāmānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:91_1_2: tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ parinirmitavaśavarttināṃ devānāṃ dharman deśayantaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:91_2: tat te devaputrās teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām antikād dharmaṃ śrutvā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair parinirvṛtāś ca parinirvānti ca parinirvāsyanti ca.
S06adsp70-u:91_3: tatra subhūtetye devaputrā udārikaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇair adhimūrcchitās,
S06adsp70-u:91_4: teṣāṃ tāni vimānāny ādīpya dharman deśayanti,
S06adsp70-u:91_5: anityā khalu mārṣaḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhā anātmāno dhruvā anāśvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmaṇaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:92_0_0: iha punar ahaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayann adrākṣaṃ bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06adsp70-u:92_0_1: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye brahmadṛṣṭāv abhiniviṣṭās tāṃs
S06adsp70-u:92_1: kathaṃ bho mārṣā śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu dṛṣṭīr utpādayatha.
S06adsp70-u:92_3: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇāyāṃ sthitvā sattvānāṃ dharman deśayanti.
S06adsp70-u:92_4: āścaryam idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām abdhutadharmaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:92_5: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād anuvidikṣu.
S06adsp70-u:93_0_0: (VIII 5,le) iha āhaṃ subhūte buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayann adrāksaṃ bodhisattvān
S06adsp70-u:93_0_1: mahāsattvān pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānādīvalukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu manuṣyāṃs caturbhiḥ
S06adsp70-u:94_0: (I) kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva dānena sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvābhyāṃ dānābhyāṃ sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:94_1: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ? yaduta (la) āmiṣadānena ca (Ib) dharmadānena ca.

S06adsp70-u:123_0: (VIII 5,3) (E) punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvān evaṃ avadati.
S06adsp70-u:123_2: ekākṣare kuśalā bhavataḥ. dvayor akṣarayor yāvad dvācatvāriṃśaty akṣareṣu kuśalā bhavata.
S06adsp70-u:123_6: ekasminn akṣare dvācatvāriṃśatam akṣarāṇy (AdSPG II 54) antargatāni bhāvayataḥ,
S06adsp70-u:123_8: sa khalu punar subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvācatvāriṃśaty akṣareṣu kuśalo bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:123_9: dvācatvāriṃśaty akṣarāṇy ekasminn akṣare kuśalo bhāvayituṃ.
S06adsp70-u:123_10: ekasminn akṣare dvācatvāriṃśatam akṣarāṇi kuśalo bhāvayituṃ.
S06adsp70-u:123_12: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyak saṃbuddho dharmakuśalo 'kṣarakuśalaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:123_13: sa dharmakuśala akṣarakuśalaś ca dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:123_15: na ca akṣara ākāranirmukta subhūte sa dharmaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:124_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:124_2: dharmāś ca nopalabhyante. dharmasvabhāvaś ca nopalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:124_4_0: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:124_4_1: vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś caturṣu
S06adsp70-u:124_4_2: dhyāneṣū caraṃś caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu.
S06adsp70-u:124_5_0: saptaviṃśatibodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu caran caturdaśasu śūnyatāsu śūnyatāyāṃ samādhau
S06adsp70-u:124_5_1: carann ānimitte samādhāv apraṇihite samādhau carann aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu
S06adsp70-u:124_5_2: daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu
S06adsp70-u:124_5_3: buddha dharmeṣu dvātriṃśatimahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣv aśītyām anuvyañjaneṣu caran.
S06adsp70-u:124_6: ṣaṭsv abhijñāsu vipākīyāsu sthitvā sattvānān dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:124_7: na ca tatra sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ.
S06adsp70-u:124_9: yāvad vijñānānupalabdhihr yāvat ṣaṭpāramitānupalabdhiḥ yāvad aśītyām anuvyañjanānupulabdhihr aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharma anupalabdhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:124_10: na ca sattvānupalabdhau sattvaprajñaptir prajñāyate na yāvad aśītir anuvyañjanāni na aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāyante.
S06adsp70-u:124_11: katham etad bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [f.
S06adsp70-u:124_12: 282b] caran sattvānān dharman deśayati? māhaiva (AdSPG II 55) sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ asatsu dharmeṣu sattvān samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:124_13: viparyāse niyojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvam eva tāvan nopalabhate prāg eva bodhipakṣyān dharmān.
S06adsp70-u:125_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi,
S06adsp70-u:125_2: bahirdhāśūnyatā veditavyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā veditavyā śūnyatāśūnyatā veditavyā mahāśūnyatā veditavyā paramārthaśūnyatā veditavyā.
S06adsp70-u:125_3: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā veditavyā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā veditavyā atyantaśūnyatā veditavyā.
S06adsp70-u:125_4: anavarāgraśūnyatā veditavyā. avakāraśūnyatā veditavyā. prakṛtiśūnyatā veditavyā. svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā veditavyā sarvadharmaśūnyatā veditavyā anupalaṃbhaśūnyatā veditavyā:
S06adsp70-u:125_7: skandhaśūnyatā veditavyā. dhātuśūnyatā veditavyā. āyatanaśūnyatā veditavyā. atyantaśūnyatā veditavyā pratītyasamutpādaśūnyatā veditavyā.
S06adsp70-u:125_11: smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatā yāvat saptatṛṃśanbodhipakṣyadharmaśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā ānimittāpraṇihitaśūnyatā veditavyā.
S06adsp70-u:125_16: srotaāpattiphalaśūnyatā yāvad arhaśūnyatā pratyekabodhiśūnyatā mārgākārajñatāśūnyatā bodhiśūnyatā buddhakṣetraśūnyatā veditavyā.
S06adsp70-u:125_17: bodhisattvaḥ punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ime sarvadharmā śūnyā iti dṛṣṭvā viparyāsagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:125_18: tathā ca deśayati yathā svapi śūnyatāsu na vartate.
S06adsp70-u:125_19: sa evaṃ paśyan sarvadharmān anāvaraṇato jñātvā na kaṃcid dharmaṃ vikopayati.
S06adsp70-u:125_20: na dvidhīkaroti, yathābhūtaṃ ca deśayati. tadyathāpi nāma tathāgata nirmitaḥ anekāni nirmitakoṭī nirmāya kāṃścid dānapāramitāyāṃ niyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:125_21: kāṃścic chīlapāramitāyāṃ kāṃści kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ kāṃścid vīryapāramitāyāṃ kāṃścit samādhipāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:125_23: kāṃścic caturṣu dhyāneṣu. kāṃścic caturṣv apramāṇeṣu. kāṃścic catasṛsv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu kāṃścic caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu.
S06adsp70-u:125_24: kāṃścid yāvat saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu niyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:125_28: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tena nirmitena kasyacid dharmasya prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:127_0: bhagavān āha: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:127_1: yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānān dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:127_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? [f. 283a] tathā hi subhūte rūpam abaddham amuktaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:127_5: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam abaddham amuktaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:127_6: yā rūpasya abaddhāmuktatā na tad rūpaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:127_7: yā vedanāyā saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya abaddhāmuktatā na tad vijñānaṃ yāvat yā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānām abaddhāmuktatā na te saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:127_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? atyantaviśuddhaṃ hi rūpaṃ yāvad atyantaviśuddhaṃ vijñānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:127_10: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:127_11: na ca sattvam upalabhate. anupalabdhau sarvaddharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sthitas tac ca asthānayogena.
S06adsp70-u:127_14: na hi saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ kvacit sthitāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:127_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo nopalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:127_16: yatra pratitiṣṭheyuḥ, na hy abhāvaḥ abhāve sthāsyati.
S06adsp70-u:127_19: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te sarve nopalabhyante.
S06adsp70-u:127_20: yā ca sā anupalabdhiḥ sā na kvacit sthāsyati.
S06adsp70-u:127_21: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān prabhāvayaty ābhiḥ sarvaśūnyatābhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:127_22_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG II 57) carann
S06adsp70-u:127_22_1: anaparādhi bhavati buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bochisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:127_22_2: ca śrāvakāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ca āryāṇāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:127_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhir bodhisattvaiś ca mahāsattvai pratyekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca eṣaiva dharmatā anubuddhā.
S06adsp70-u:127_25: tāṃ te dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ na vyativartante.
S06adsp70-u:127_26: tat kasya hetoḥr? na hi dharmatā vyativartate.
S06adsp70-u:127_28: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate.
S06adsp70-u:128_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:128_1: yadi bhagavan dharmadhātur na vyativartate na tathatā na bhūtakoṭir vyativartate.
S06adsp70-u:128_2_0: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyad rūpam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ yāvad
S06adsp70-u:128_2_1: anyad vijñānam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ yāvad anye saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā
S06adsp70-u:128_2_2: dharmā laukikalokottarā sāsravānāsravā dharmāḥ anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā
S06adsp70-u:129_0_0: bhagavān āha: no hīdaṃ subhūte, na subhūte anyo rūpam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā
S06adsp70-u:129_0_1: anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ yāvan nānyad vijñānam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ
S06adsp70-u:129_0_2: yāvan na anye sarvadharmā anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:130_0_0: āha: yadi bhagavan na anyad rūpam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ
S06adsp70-u:130_0_1: yāvan na anyad vijñānam anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ yāvan na anye
S06adsp70-u:130_0_2: sarvadharmā anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:130_3: narakā vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā:
S06adsp70-u:130_7: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:131_0: bhagavān āha: saṃvṛtisatyaṃ subhūte pramāṇīkṛtya phalavyavasthānaṃ nirdiśyate,
S06adsp70-u:131_1: na punaḥ paramārthasatyena phalavyavasthānaṃ śakyaṃ nirdeṣṭuṃ.
S06adsp70-u:131_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? avikalpo hi sa dharmaḥ apravyāharo,
S06adsp70-u:131_3: (AdSPG II 58) yaduta nāmasatyaṃ rūpasatyam anutpāda anirodhaḥ asaṃkleśaḥ avyavadānaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:132_0: āha: yadi bhagavan saṃvṛtisatyam upādāya phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:132_1: na paramārthasatyena. nanu bhagavaṃ. sarvabālapṛthagjanānāṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:133_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte bālapṛthagjanāḥ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ vā paramārthasatyaṃ vā prajānānti.
S06adsp70-u:133_1: yadi prajānaṃti teṣām api phalavyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:133_2: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vā samyaksaṃbodhir vā.
S06adsp70-u:133_3: yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bālapṛthagjanānāṃ na mārgo na mārgavyavasthānaṃ na mārgabhāvanā,
S06adsp70-u:133_4: tat kuto bālapṛthagjanānāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati? āryapudgalānāṃ punar mārgaś ca mārgabhāvanā ca.
S06adsp70-u:134_0: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan mārgabhāvanāyā phalaprāptir bhavati. phalaṃ vā prāpyate?
S06adsp70-u:135_0: bhagavān āha: no hīdaṃ subhūte, na mārgabhāvanāyā phalaprāptir bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:135_1: phalaṃ vā prāpyate. na punaḥ subhūte abhāvitamārgasya phalaprāptir na mārgeṇa phalaṃ prāpsyate.
S06adsp70-u:135_2: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ phalavyavasthānaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:135_3: na ca bhāgacchedena saṃskṛtadhātor vā asaṃskṛtadhātor vā phalavyavasthānam.
S06adsp70-u:136_0: āha: yadi bhagavan na bhāgacchedena saṃskṛtadhātor vā asaṃskṛtadhātor vā phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp70-u:136_5: arhatvaṃ pañcānām ūrddhaṃbhāgīyānāṃ (AdSPG II 59) saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt,
S06adsp70-u:136_6: pratyekabodhir yat kiṃcit samudayadharma sarvan taṃ nirodhadharmeti samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇāt.
S06adsp70-u:136_7: asya vayaṃ bhagavan bhāṣitasya katham artham ājānīyāma,
S06adsp70-u:136_8: na saṃskṛtānāṃ vā asaṃskṛtānāṃ vā dharmāṇāṃ bhāgacchedena phalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
S06adsp70-u:137_0_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ
S06adsp70-u:137_0_1: vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir vā saṃskṛtam etad utāho
S06adsp70-u:138_0: āha: asaṃskṛtam etad bhagavan na saṃskṛtaṃ sugataḥ.
S06adsp70-u:139_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte asaṃskṛtasya dharmasya bhāgacchedo 'sti?
S06adsp70-u:141_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yasmin samaye kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā.
S06adsp70-u:141_2: yaduta alakṣaṇān. api nu tasmin samaye kasyacid dharmasya bhāgacchedaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:141_3: saṃskṛtam iti vā asaṃskṛtam iti vā?
S06adsp70-u:143_0: bhagavān āha: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvānāṃ dharman deśayaty abhāgacchedatām upādāya.
S06adsp70-u:143_5: dānapāramitāyāṃ vā śīlapāramitāyāṃ vā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vā vīryapāramitāyāṃ vā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vā,
S06adsp70-u:143_6: prathame vā dhyāne yāvac caturthe vā dhyāne.
S06adsp70-u:143_7: maitryāṃ vā karuṇāyāṃ vā muditāyāṃ vā upekṣāyāṃ vā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau vā smṛtyupasthāneṣu vā.
S06adsp70-u:143_8: yāvad āryāṣṭāṅge mārge. yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ vā, so 'nabhiniviṣṭo na kvacit sajjate.
S06adsp70-u:143_9: tadyathāpi nāma tathāgatanirmito dānaṃ ca dadāti na ca dānaphale sajjate.
S06adsp70-u:143_10: na dānaphalaṃ pratyanubhavaty anyatra sarvasattvānāṃ parinirvāpanārthaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:143_11: yāvat ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yāvat sāsravānāsraveṣu dharmeṣu laukikalokottareṣu saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛteṣu na kvacit tiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:143_12: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmeṣu carati.
S06adsp70-u:143_13: na kvacid dharme tiṣṭhati na sajjate.
S06adsp70-u:143_14: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asya dharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ supratividdhaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:146_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:146_1: kathaṃ bhagavan dharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇaṃ supratividdhaṃ bhavati?
S06adsp70-u:147_0: bhagavān āha: yathā subhūte nirmitasya asamudācāro rāgadveṣamoheṣu asamudācāro rūpeṣv asamudācāro yāvad vijñāne.
S06adsp70-u:147_1_0: evam asamudācāra [f. 284a] ādhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu asamudācāra anuśayaparyutthāneṣu
S06adsp70-u:147_1_1: asamudācāraḥ sāsravānāsraveṣu dharmeṣv asamudācāra laukikalokottareṣu saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛteṣu
S06adsp70-u:147_2: evaṃ subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmanayaḥ supratividdhaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:149_0: bhagavān āha: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate vā,
S06adsp70-u:150_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vastukān sarvadharmān pratividhyati?
S06adsp70-u:151_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte, api nu tathāgatanirmitasya kiṃcid vastv asti yad vastv āgamya saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā,
S06adsp70-u:152_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan, na bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmitasya kiṃcid vastv asti yad vastv āgamya saṃkliśyeta vā vyavadāyeta vā.
S06adsp70-u:153_0: bhagavān āha: evaṃ khalu subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmanayaḥ supratividdho bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:154_0: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ. sarvaṃ rūpaṃ tathāgatanirmitopamaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:155_0: bhagavān āha: sarvaṃ subhūte rūpaṃ nirmitopamaṃ sarvā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nirmitopamaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:156_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puruṣakāro bhavati,
S06adsp70-u:156_1: yadi sarvaṃ rūpaṃ nirmitopamaṃ yāvat sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ nirmitopamaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:156_2: nirmitasya bhagavan na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā (AdSPG II 61) na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:156_3: na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ nāpi pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro yato sattvān parimucyeta.
S06adsp70-u:157_0_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvacārikāṃ
S06adsp70-u:157_0_1: caratā kaścit sattva upalabhdo yan narakāt parimocayet tiryagyoner vā yamalokād vā
S06adsp70-u:159_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kaścit sattvo upalabdho yaṃ traidhātukāt parimocayet.
S06adsp70-u:159_1: tathā hy anena sarvadharmā māyopamā jñātā dṛṣṭā viditā.
S06adsp70-u:160_0: āha: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā māyopamā nirmitopamājñātā dṛṣṭā viditā.
S06adsp70-u:160_1: kasya punar arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carati.
S06adsp70-u:160_2: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu saptatriṃśatibodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu bodhimārge carati.
S06adsp70-u:161_0: bhagavān āha: yadi subhūte sattvā svayam eva nirmitopamā sarvadharmāñ jānīyur,
S06adsp70-u:161_1: na bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya asaṃkhyeyān kalpān bodhisattvacārikāṃ caret.
S06adsp70-u:161_2: yasmāt tarhi subhūte sattvā svayam eva nirmitopamān sarvadharmān na jānanti,
S06adsp70-u:161_3: tasmād bodhisattva mahāsattvaḥ asaṃkhyeyān kalpān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carati.
S06adsp70-u:161_4: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06adsp70-u:162_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:162_2: kva bhagavan. sattvāḥ pratiṣṭhitā yato bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann uccālayati?
S06adsp70-u:163_0: bhagavān āha: nāmanimitteṣu subhūte sattvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ asatparikalpe tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nāmanimittād uccālayati.
S06adsp70-u:164_0: āha: katamad bhagavan nāma katamaṃ nimittaṃ?
S06adsp70-u:165_1: bhagavān āha: āgantukam etat subhūte nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yaduta nāmeti vā nimittam iti vā.
S06adsp70-u:165_2: kṛtṛmam etan nāmadheyaṃ yaduta nāmeti vā nimittam iti vā.
S06adsp70-u:165_3: rūpam iti vā vedaneti vā. saṃjñeti vā saṃskārāḥ iti vā.
S06adsp70-u:165_4: vijñānam iti vā. strī vā puruṣa iti vā. dāraka iti vā dāraketi vā. nārakā iti vā tairyagyonikā iti vā yāmalaukika iti vā.
S06adsp70-u:165_5: deva iti vā. manuṣya iti vā. saṃskṛtā dharmā iti vā asaṃskṛtā dharmā iti vā.
S06adsp70-u:165_6: srotaāpatiphalam iti vā. sakṛdāgāmiphalam iti vā. anāgāmiphalam iti vā. arhattvam iti vā pratyekabodhim iti vā.
S06adsp70-u:165_8: api tu khalu subhūte prajñaptidharma sarvaṃ tan nāma nāmārthena.
S06adsp70-u:165_9: nāmamātram idaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ yatra bālapṛthagjanāḥ saktāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:165_10: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena samanvāgato vivecayati.
S06adsp70-u:165_13: asati vastuni svabhāvaśūnye, na hi śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu paṇḍitā abhiniviśante,
S06adsp70-u:165_14: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:165_15: katamat subhūte nimittaṃ? dve ime subhūte nimitte yatra bālapṛthagjanāḥ saktāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:165_16: katame dve? yaduta rūpanimittaṃ ca ārūpyanimittaṃ ca.
S06adsp70-u:165_17: katamañ ca subhūte rūpanimittaṃ? yat kiṃcit subhūte rūpam audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yad atra kṣaṇikeṣu dharmeṣu parikalpanayā grahaṇam eti.
S06adsp70-u:165_18: idam ucyate rūpanimittaṃ. katamac ca subhūte ārūpyanimittaṃ? yat kiṃcid arūpiṇāṃ dharmāṇām0nimittagrāheṇa parikalpya kleśo jāyate,
S06adsp70-u:165_19: idam ucyate ārūpyanimittaṃ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena tato nimittād vivecya ānimitte dhātau niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06adsp70-u:165_20: tathā uca niveśayati. tathā pratiṣṭhāpayati yathā na dvaye patati.
S06adsp70-u:165_22: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG II 63) carann upāyakauśalena sattvān nimittād vivecya ānimitte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:166_0: āha: yadi bhagavann iyat paramā ete sarvadharmā yaduta nāmanimittaparamāḥ prajñaptimātrāḥ parikalpasamutthitāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:166_1: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ātmanā ca viśeṣam adhigacchati.
S06adsp70-u:166_2: kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu. paraṃ ca viśeṣa adhigame pratiṣṭhāpayati kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu.
S06adsp70-u:167_0: bhagavān āha: sacet subhūte vastv abhaviṣyan na avastu nimittaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:167_1: nedaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu viśeṣam adhyagamiṣyan na paraṃ ca viśeṣādhigame niyojayiṣyat.
S06adsp70-u:167_2: yasmāt tarhy avastu nimittaṃ na vastu,
S06adsp70-u:167_3_0: tasmāt subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayaty
S06adsp70-u:167_3_1: ānimittayogena vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayaty
S06adsp70-u:167_17: sa imān kuśalān dharmān [f. 285a] paripūrya parān atraiva kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu niyojayaty ānimittayogena.
S06adsp70-u:167_18: sacet punaḥ subhūte dharma nimittam abhaviṣyad antaśo vālāgrakoṭinikṣepamātram api,
S06adsp70-u:167_19: nedaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG II 64) carann ānimittam asmṛtim amanasikāraṃ dharmam abhisaṃbhotsyata.
S06adsp70-u:167_20: sattvāṃś ca tathātve pratyupasthāpayiṣyati anāsraveṣu dharmeṣu,
S06adsp70-u:167_21: sarve hi subhūte anāsravā dharmā ānimittam asmṛtir amanasikāraḥ.
S06adsp70-u:167_22: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoty anāsravair dharmaiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:168_0: āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā ānimittam asmṛtir amanasikāraḥ,
S06adsp70-u:168_1_0: kuto bhagavaṃ. gaṇanāṃ kariṣyāmi; ime sāsravā dharmā ime anāsravā dharmā ime sādhāraṇā
S06adsp70-u:168_1_1: dharmā ime asādhāraṇā dharmā ime śrāvakadharmā ime pratyekabuddhadharmā ime bodhisattvadharmā
S06adsp70-u:169_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyad ānimittam anye śrāvakadharmāḥ?
S06adsp70-u:171_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyad ānimittam anye pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ anyad ānimittam anye bodhisattvadharmā anyad ānimittam anye buddhadharmāḥ?
S06adsp70-u:173_0: bhagavān āha: nanu subhūte ānimittam eva srotaāpattiphalaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:173_1: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ. anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ. pratyekabodhir bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāḥ?
S06adsp70-u:174_0: āha: evam etad bhagavan evam etat sugata.
S06adsp70-u:175_0: bhagavān āha: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam:
S06adsp70-u:175_2: atra hi subhūte śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ānimitteṣu sarvadharmeṣu vivardhate kuśalair dharmaiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:175_3_0: yaduta ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiś caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ
S06adsp70-u:175_3_1: caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir
S06adsp70-u:175_4_0: pañcabhir balaiḥ. ṣaḍbhir anusmṛtibhiḥ. saptabhir bodhyaṅgair. āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa:
S06adsp70-u:175_4_1: yāvat sarvabuddhadharmaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy anyatra śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena
S06adsp70-u:175_4_2: mahāsattvena anyatra śūnyatā ānimitta apraṇihiteṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:175_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu sarvakuśaladharmā antargatāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:175_9: (AdSPG II 65) sa iha tṛṣu vimokṣamukheṣu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva pañcasu skandheṣu śikṣate.
S06adsp70-u:175_10: dvādaśasv āyataneṣu śikṣate. aṣṭādaśasu dhātuṣu śikṣate. caturṣv āryasatyeṣu śikṣate. dvādaśāṃgike pratītyasamutpāde śikṣate.
S06adsp70-u:175_11: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate. bahirddhāsūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate. adhyātmabahirddhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate.
S06adsp70-u:175_17: caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyām aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣate.
S06adsp70-u:176_0: subhūtir āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pañcasu upādānaskandheṣu śikṣate?
S06adsp70-u:177_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_1: yathā ca rūpam utpadyate. yathā rūpaṃ nirudhyate. yathā rūpasya tathatā. kathaṃ rūpaṃ prajānāti iti? atyantacchidrataś ca atyantasuṣirataś ca.
S06adsp70-u:177_2: tadyathāpi nāma phenapiṇḍa asārakaḥ evaṃ rūpaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_3: kathaṃ ca [f. 285b] rūpasya utpādaṃ prajānāti? na rūpaṃ kutaścid āgacchati nāpi rūpaṃ kvacid gacchati ity akutaścid āgamanataś ca akvacid gamanataś ca rūpasya utpādaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_4: yan na kutaścid āgataṃ na kvacid gataṃ,
S06adsp70-u:177_5: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva rūpasya utpādavyayaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_6: kathaṃ ca rūpasya tathatāṃ prajānāti? na tathatā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā na āgacchati na gacchati.
S06adsp70-u:177_8: ni hīyate na vardhate. evaṃ tathatāṃ prajānāti. avitathatā subhūte tathatā tasmāt tathatāity ucyate.
S06adsp70-u:177_9: na sā vitatathā tena tathātety ucyate.
S06adsp70-u:177_11: kathaṃ ca vedanāṃ prajānāti? kathaṃ vedanāyā utpādaṃ kathaṃ vedanāyā vyayaṃ kathaṃ vedanāyāṃs tathatāṃ prajānāti? tadyathāpi nāma udakabudbudā riktakā utpadyante ca nirudhyante ca.
S06adsp70-u:177_12: evaṃ vedanāṃ prajānāti. na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati.
S06adsp70-u:177_14: kathaṃ ca vedanāyās tathatāṃ prajānāti? avitathatātathatā.
S06adsp70-u:177_16: kathaṃ ca saṃjñāṃ prajānāti? tadyathā (AdSPG II 66) marīcikāyām udakam atyantatayā nopalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:177_17: evaṃ saṃjñāṃ prajānāti. na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati.
S06adsp70-u:177_19: kathaṃ ca saṃjñātathatāṃ prajānāti? yathaiva vedanātathatā evaṃ saṃjñātathatāṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_20: kathaṃ saṃskārān prajānāti tadyathāpi nāma kadalyāḥ sāram asāratayā patra patraṃ kṛtvā nopalabhyate evaṃ saṃskārān prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_21: kathaṃ saṃskārāṇām utpādavyayaṃ prajānāti? akutaścid āgamanatayā akvacid gamanatayā saṃskārāṇām utpādavyayaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_22: kathaṃ ca saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatāṃ prajānāti? vedanātathatayā saṃskāratathatāṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_23: kathaṃ vijñānaṃ prajānāti? tadyathāpi nāma māyākāranirmitaś caturaṅgo balakāya.
S06adsp70-u:177_24: evaṃ vijñānaṃ prajānāti. na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati.
S06adsp70-u:177_26: kathaṃ vijñānasya tathatāṃ prajānāti? vedanātathatayā vijñānatathatāṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_27: kathaṃ ca dhātūn prajānāti? cakṣurdhātuś cakṣurdhātusvabhāvena śūnyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:177_30: evaṃ yāvan manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātuḥ kartavyaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:177_31: kathaṃ ca āyatanāni prajānāti? ādhyātmikā dharmā ādhyātmikair dharmai śūnyāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:177_33: evam āyatanāni prajānāti. kathaṃ ca āryasatyaṃ prajānāti duḥkhaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_34: satyaṃ prajānāti. āryasatyaṃ prajānāti. dvayatāvinirmuktam āryasatyam advayaṃ hi āryāṇāṃ satyam iti prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_35: evaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ nirodhagāminīpratipadam āryasatyaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_36: kathaṃ duḥkhatathatāṃ prajānāti? tathat?aiva duḥkhasya tathateti prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_38: tathatāṃ prajānāti. kathaṃ ca pratītyasamutpādaṃ prajānāti? anutpādato pratītyasamutpādaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:177_39: evam anirodhato 'nucchedato 'śāśvatato 'nekārthato 'nānārthato 'nāgamato na nirgamataḥ prapañcoparamataḥ śivaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:178_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:178_1: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ime parasparabhinnān (AdSPG II 67) dharmān evaṃ prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:179_0: bhagavān āha: vikopita subhūte syād yadi dharmadhāturvinirmuktaḥ +anyaḥ? kaścid dharmaḥ syād.
S06adsp70-u:179_1: na subhūte dharmadhātuvinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:179_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte tathāgatena vā bodhisattvena vā.
S06adsp70-u:179_6: anupalabhya na prajñapayati. dharmadhāturvinirmukto 'nyaḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyata iti.
S06adsp70-u:179_7: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dharmadhātau śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:180_0: subhūtir āha: dharmadhātau bhagavaṃc chikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kvacic chikṣitaṃ bhavati?
S06adsp70-u:181_0: bhagavān āha: dharmadhātau subhūte śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:181_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte sarvadharmā dharmadhātuḥ.
S06adsp70-u:182_0: āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā dharmadhātuḥ?
S06adsp70-u:183_0: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita eva dharmāṇāṃ dharmadhātur abhedayogena.
S06adsp70-u:183_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena dharmadhātau śikṣitaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:184_1_0: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ? samādhipāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:184_1_1: vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ
S06adsp70-u:184_1_2: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathame dhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ dvitīye tritīye caturthe
S06adsp70-u:184_1_3: dhyāne śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyām upekṣāyām ākāśānanyāyatane
S06adsp70-u:184_1_4: yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatane śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu yāvad
S06adsp70-u:184_1_5: āryāṣṭāṅge mārge śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ (AdSPG II 68) śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu śikṣitavyaṃ?
S06adsp70-u:184_1_6: katham aṣṭādaśasu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ daśasu
S06adsp70-u:184_1_7: tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:184_1_8: mahāmuditāyāṃ mahopekṣāyām aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ
S06adsp70-u:184_1_10: katham aśīty anuvyañjanapariniṣpattau śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ kṣatriyamahāsālakulopapattau
S06adsp70-u:184_1_12: devānām upapattau trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ
S06adsp70-u:184_1_13: brahmakāyikānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ vṛhaṇāṃ parīttavṛhanāṃ vṛhatphalānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:184_1_14: devānām upapattau śikṣitavyaṃ? katham asaṃjñīsattvopapattau śuddhāvāsadevanikayopapattau
S06adsp70-u:184_2: kathaṃ dvitīye tritīye caturthe pañcame ṣaṣṭe saptame aṣṭhame navame daśame cittotpāde śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:184_3_0: kathaṃ śrāvakabhūmau pratyekabuddhabhūmau bodhisattvaniyāme śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ sattvaparipāke
S06adsp70-u:184_3_2: śikṣitavyaṃ? kathaṃ bodhimārge śikṣitavyaṃ yatra śikṣamāṇena sarvadharmāḥ sarvākārair
S06adsp70-u:184_3_3: jñātavyāḥ? yadi bhagavan dharmadhātāv ime vikalpā na santi,
S06adsp70-u:184_4: māhaiva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viparyāse caret.
S06adsp70-u:184_5: aprapañcyaṃ prapañcayet. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan dharmadhātāv ime vikalpāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:184_6: na hi dharmadhātur rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na dharmadhātur vijñānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:184_7: nānyatra rūpād dharmadhātur nānyatra vedanāyā saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānād dharmadhātur.
S06adsp70-u:184_8: rūpam eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva rūpaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:184_9: yāvad vijnānam eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva vijñānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:185_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, tathā yathā vadasi. rūpam eva dharmadhātur [f. 286b] dharmadhātur eva rūpaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:185_1: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānam eva dharmadhātur dharmadhātur eva vijñānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:185_2: yadi punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ (AdSPG II 69) caran kaṃcid dharmaṃ dharmadhātuvinirmuktaṃ paśyen na anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhayaṃ pratiṣṭhita.
S06adsp70-u:185_3: yasmāt sarvadharmā dharmadhātus tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān dharmadhātur iti jñātvā anāmakāni sarvadharmān nāmasaṃketena deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:185_4: idaṃ rūpam ity iyaṃ vedanā iti iyaṃ saṃjñā iti ime saṃskārā iti idaṃ vijñānam iti.
S06adsp70-u:186_0: (VIII 5,4) tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārantevāsī vā yat kiṃcid eva dravyajātam adhiṣṭhāya vividhaṃ rūpagataṃ sandarśayet.
S06adsp70-u:186_1: yaduta hastivigrahaṃ vā aśvavigrahaṃ vā balīvardavigrahaṃ vā puruṣastridārakadārikavigrahaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:186_7: dānaṃ vā dadaṃc chīlaṃ vā rakṣan kṣāntyā vā saṃpādayan vīryaṃ vā ārabhamāṇaḥ samādhir vā vikrīnun prajñāṃ vā bhāvayan.
S06adsp70-u:186_9: kṣatriyamahāsālakulāni vā darśayet brāhmaṇamahāsālakulāni vā gṛhapatimahāsālakulāni vā darśayet.
S06adsp70-u:186_11: sumeruṃ vā darśayet, trayastriṃśān vā yāmān vā tuṣitān vā nirmaṇaratīṃ vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā devān yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagātvā devān darśayed,
S06adsp70-u:186_12: arūpiṇa srotaāpannaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmino vā anāgāmino vā arhanto vā pratyekabuddhān vā.
S06adsp70-u:186_13: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti.
S06adsp70-u:186_14: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti.
S06adsp70-u:186_15: prathamāyāṃ bhūmau caranti. yāvad daśamyāṃ mahābhūmau caranti.
S06adsp70-u:186_17: tābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍanti sattvāṃś (AdSPG II 70) ca paripācayanti.
S06adsp70-u:186_21: duṣkaracaryān vā caranti. tathāgatabalāni vā niṣpādayanti.
S06adsp70-u:186_22: vaiśāradyāni vā pratisaṃvido vā mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ vā tān api darśayet.
S06adsp70-u:186_25: aho yāvat suśikṣito 'yaṃ manuṣyaḥ kathaṃ śobhanaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:186_26: yad imaṃ janam evaṃ ramayaty evaṃ vividhāni ca rūpāṇy ādarśayati.
S06adsp70-u:186_27: yāvad buddhavigrahaṃ vā. ye khalu punas tatra manuṣyā bhavanti paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinaḥ tadrūpayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgatā teṣām evaṃ bhavaty.
S06adsp70-u:186_28: āścaryam idam adbhutadharmo na cātra kaścid dharma upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:186_29: ayaṃ ca manuṣya imāṃ janatām evam asadbhir dharmair ramayati.
S06adsp70-u:186_32: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaścid dharman dharmadhātuvinirmuktaṃ paśyati.
S06adsp70-u:186_33: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena na ca sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ.
S06adsp70-u:187_0: (VIII 5,5). sa ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti paraṃ ca dāne samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:187_1: dānasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye 'py anye sattvā dānaṃ dadanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:187_2: ātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣati. paraṃ ca śīle samādāpayati. śīlasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye 'py anye śīlaṃ rakṣanti.
S06adsp70-u:187_3: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī [f. 287a] bhavati samanujñaḥ. evam ātmanā ca kṣāntiṃ bhāvayaṃti.
S06adsp70-u:187_5: kṣānteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye 'py anye kṣāntiṃ bhāvayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:187_6: ātmanā ca vīryam ārabhate. paraṃ ca vīrye samādāpayati. vīryasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye 'py anye vīryam ārabhante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:187_9: samādheś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye 'py anye samādhiṃ samāpadyante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:187_11: paraṃ ca prajñāyāṃ samādāpayati prajñāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate.
S06adsp70-u:188_0: (VIII 5,6) ātmanā ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante paraṃ ca daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:188_1: daśānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ karmapatḥ ānāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate.
S06adsp70-u:188_2: ye 'py anye (AdSPG II 71) sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:188_6: ye ca anye sattvā aṣṭāṅgasamamanvāgataṃ poṣadham upavasanti.
S06adsp70-u:188_11: ye ca anye sattvā pañcaśikṣāpadāni samādāya vartante teṣāṃca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:188_12: evam ātmanā ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate yāva caturthaṃ maitrīṃ karuṇāṃ muditāṃ upekṣām ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñanāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ.
S06adsp70-u:188_14: yāvad āryāṣṭāṃgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīr daśatathāgatabalāni.
S06adsp70-u:188_15: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān aśītim anuvyañjanāni bhāvayati.
S06adsp70-u:188_17: aśītir anuvyañjanānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye 'py anye sattvā aśītim anuvyañjanāni bhāvayanti.
S06adsp70-u:189_0: (VIII 5,7) yadi subhūte dharmadhātur yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tathā madhye nābhaviṣyat.
S06adsp70-u:189_1: na bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalena sattvānāṃ dharmadhātuṃ sūcayati.
S06adsp70-u:189_2: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyati. yasmāt tarhi subhūte dharmadhātur yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tathā madhye,
S06adsp70-u:189_3: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvānāṃ dharmadhātuṃ sūcayati.
S06adsp70-u:192_2: na sattvaprajñaptiḥ, kasya arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati?
S06adsp70-u:193_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:193_1: bhūtakoṭiṃ subhūte pramāṇīkṛtya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:193_2: yadi subhūte anyā bhūtakoṭir bhaved anyā sattvakoṭir (AdSPG II 72) na bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret.
S06adsp70-u:193_3: yasmāt tarhi subhūte na anyā bhūtakoṭir anyā sattvakoṭis,
S06adsp70-u:193_4: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvānām arthe prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:193_5: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūtakoṭyavikopanatayā sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:194_4: na ca bhagavaṃ svabhāva svabhāve pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:194_5: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati?
S06adsp70-u:195_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratitiṣṭhate.
S06adsp70-u:195_2: api tu khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvakoṭir bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:195_3: na ca anyā bhūtakoṭir anyā sattvakoṭir,
S06adsp70-u:195_4: iti hi sattvakoṭiś ca bhūtakoṭiś ca advayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ.
S06adsp70-u:196_0_0: āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām upāyakauśalaṃ yena upāyakauśalena
S06adsp70-u:196_0_1: samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
S06adsp70-u:197_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_1: dāne pratiṣṭhāpya tasya dānasya pūrvāntāparāntamadhyam ācaṣṭe.
S06adsp70-u:197_2: yathaiva tad dānaṃ pūrvāntataḥ śūnyam aparāntataḥ.
S06adsp70-u:197_3: śūnyaṃ madhayataḥ śūnyaṃ, tathaiva dānaphalam api śūnyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:197_4: dānapatir api śūnyaḥ. pratigrāhako 'pi śūnyaḥ. evaṃ kulaputrā: sarva ete 'rthā bhūtakoṭyāṃ na saṃvidyante.
S06adsp70-u:197_5: mā ca anyad dānaṃ maṃsyase 'nyad dānaphalaṃ mā ca anyad dānapatiṃ maṃsyase 'nyaṃ pratigrāhakaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:197_6: yadā tvaṃ kulaputra na anyad dānaṃ maṃsyase 'nyad dānaphalaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:197_8: tadā tavedaṃ dānam amṛtaṃ bhaviṣyaty amṛtaphalaparyavasānam.
S06adsp70-u:197_9: anena ca dānena mā rūpaṃ parigrahīr mā vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ mā saṃskārān mā vijñānaṃ parigrahī.
S06adsp70-u:197_10: tat kasya hetor? yathā hy etad dānaṃ śūnyaṃ dānena.
S06adsp70-u:197_11: asya phalaṃ śūnyaṃ phalena. dānapatir api śūnyo dānapatinā.
S06adsp70-u:197_14: na dānaphalaṃ na dānapatir na pratigrāhakaḥ upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:197_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy atyantatayā ete dharmā svabhāvena śūnyā.
S06adsp70-u:197_16: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_17: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prāṇātipātaṃ prahāya prāṇātipātāt prativirama.
S06adsp70-u:197_18: yāvat mithyādṛṣṭiṃ prahāya: mithyādṛṣṭiṃ prativirama. naiṣāṃ kulaputra dharmāṇāṃkaścit svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate:
S06adsp70-u:197_19: yathā te parikalpitaḥ, hanta tāvat kulaputra vyupaparīkṣasva:
S06adsp70-u:197_20: katama eṣa dharmaḥ prāṇīnām ayaṃ jīvitān vyaparopayiṣyasi.
S06adsp70-u:197_21: yena vā vyaparopayiṣyasi. yāvan mithyādṛṣṭe kartavyaṃ. anena ca subhūte upāyakauśalena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_22: sa tasya dānasya ca śīlasya ca phalam ācaṣṭe.
S06adsp70-u:197_23: tad api dānaphalaṃ ca śīlaphalaṃ ca svabhāvena śūnyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:197_24: tataḥ sa kulaputro dānasya ca śīlasya ca phalaṃ śūnyam iti viditvā tatra na abhiniviśate.
S06adsp70-u:197_26: yayā prajñayā sarva anuśayaparyutthanāni cchitvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāti.
S06adsp70-u:197_28: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:197_30: api tu khalu tad eva asya parinirvāṇaṃ yaduta [f.
S06adsp70-u:197_31: 288a] atyantaśūnyatā. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parasattvān parapudgalān kṣubhitān vyāpannacittān dṛṣṭvā evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti.
S06adsp70-u:197_32: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntyā saṃpādaya kṣāntiñ ca bhāvaya (AdSPG II 74) adhivāsanajātīyo bhava,
S06adsp70-u:197_33: yo vā vyāpadyate. yena vā vyāpadyase. yatra vā vyāpadyase: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā,
S06adsp70-u:197_34: hanta tāvat kulaputra vyupaparīkṣva ko 'tra vyāpadyate.
S06adsp70-u:197_35: kasmiṃ vyāpadye. kena vā vyāpadye: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā.
S06adsp70-u:197_36: yā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā na sā jātu na śūnyatā,
S06adsp70-u:197_37_0: sā na tathāgataiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na śrāvakair na bodhisattvair na devair
S06adsp70-u:197_37_1: na nāgair na yakṣair na gandharvair na kinnarair na mahoragair na cāturmahārājakāyikair
S06adsp70-u:197_37_2: devair yāvan na paranirmitavaśavartibhiḥ na brahmābhir yāvan na śubhakṛtsnair na
S06adsp70-u:197_38: tad hanta tāvat kulaputra vyupapaparīkṣasva ko 'tra vyāpadyate kasya vā vyāpadye.
S06adsp70-u:197_39: kena vā vyāpadye: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:197_40: na hi śūnyatā kasyacid antike vyāpadyate.
S06adsp70-u:197_41: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sattvān upāyakauśalena prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ niyojayaty.
S06adsp70-u:197_42: api hetāv api phale. prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ niyojayann anupūrveṇa anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃharṣayati samādāpayati niveśayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_43: pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena.
S06adsp70-u:197_44: tat kasya hetor? na hi prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid asti yaḥ prāpnuyād yena vā prāpnuyād yad vā prāpnuyāt.
S06adsp70-u:197_45: iyaṃ subhūte bhūtakoṭiḥ prakṛtiśūnyatā yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:197_46: sattvānāṃ kṛte, na ca tatra sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ.
S06adsp70-u:197_47: tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvaviviktā hi sarvadharmāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:197_48: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvāṃ hīnavīryān kusīdān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ kāyike caitasike vīrye samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_49: na hi kulaputra: prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kasyacid dharmasya saṃsīdanā vidyate.
S06adsp70-u:197_50: yatra saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded yo vā saṃsīdet,
S06adsp70-u:197_51: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā na vyativartante.
S06adsp70-u:197_52: hantedāniṃ kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayya kausīdyam utsṛjya kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu prayujyasva:
S06adsp70-u:197_53: yadi vā dāne yadi vā śīle yadi vā kṣāntau yadi vā vīrye.
