S06adsp70-u:197_54: yadi vā dhyāne yadi vā prajñāyāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:197_55: yadi vā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṣu yadi vā smṛtyupasthāneṣu yadi vā yāvad āryāṣṭāṅge mārge (AdSPG II 75) yadi vā śūnyatāyāṃ yadi
S06adsp70-u:197_57: yadi vā sarvabuddhadharmeṣu: sarvān etān kulaputra dharmān anāvaraṇān prekṣasva śūnyatāyā,
S06adsp70-u:197_58: na hy anāvaraṇeṣu dharmeṣu kasyacid dharmasya saṃsīdanā saṃvidyate.
S06adsp70-u:197_59: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvāṃ samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_60: niveśayati. pratiṣṭhāpayati. tathā punaḥ pratiṣṭhāpayati. yatra dvayan na vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? advayā hi prakṛtiśūnyatā advaidhīkārā,
S06adsp70-u:197_61: na hy advayo dharmaḥ na kvacit saṃsīdati.
S06adsp70-u:197_62: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajnāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatayā vīrye sattvān avavadaty anuśāsti.
S06adsp70-u:197_63: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra vīryam ārabhasva yadi vā dāne yadi vā śīle yadi vā kṣāntau.
S06adsp70-u:197_64: yadi vā vīrye yadi vā dhyāne yadi vā prajñe.
S06adsp70-u:197_65: yadi vā smṛtyupasthāneṣu yadi vā yāvad āryāṣṭāṅge mārge.
S06adsp70-u:197_66: yadi vā aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu yadi vā navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu.
S06adsp70-u:197_67: yadi vā daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu yadi vā caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu.
S06adsp70-u:197_68: yadi vā catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu yadi vā mahāmaitryāṃ yadi vā mahākaruṇāyāṃ yadi vā aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu,
S06adsp70-u:197_69: mā caitān dharmān dvayato manasikārṣīr mā advayata,
S06adsp70-u:197_71: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatā dvayato manasikartavyā na advayataḥ.
S06adsp70-u:197_72: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃ sattvāṃ paripācayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_74: sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratyekabodhau yāvad anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_75: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajnāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena vikṣiptacittān sattvān evam avavadati.
S06adsp70-u:197_76: evam anuśāsti, ehi tvaṃ kulaputra samādhiṃ bhāvaya,
S06adsp70-u:197_79: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yo vikṣipyate ekāgri bhavati vā.
S06adsp70-u:197_80: sa tvam atra samādhau sthitvā yad yad eva kuśalamūlaṃ kariṣyasi kāyena vā.
S06adsp70-u:197_81: vācā vā manasā vā. yadi vā dānaṃ dāsyasi. yadi vā śīlaṃ rakṣasyasi. yadi vā kṣāntyā saṃpādayiṣyasi.
S06adsp70-u:197_82: yadi vā vīryam ārapsyase, yadi vā samādhim utpādayiṣyasi.
S06adsp70-u:197_85: (AdSPG II 76) yadi vā yāvad āryāṣṭāṅge mārge.
S06adsp70-u:197_86: yadi vā triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu yadi vā aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu yadi vā navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu.
S06adsp70-u:197_88: yadi vā caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu yadi vā catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu:
S06adsp70-u:197_89: yadi vā mahāmaitryāṃ yadi vā mahākaruṇāyāṃ mahāmuditāyāṃ mahopekṣāyāṃ yadi vā aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu:
S06adsp70-u:197_90: yadi vā dvātṛṃśatimahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣu yadi vā aśītyām anuvyaṃjaneṣu.
S06adsp70-u:197_91: yadi vā śrāvakamārge yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārge.
S06adsp70-u:197_92: yadi vā bodhisattvamārge. yadi vā buddhamārge. yadi vā srotaāpattiphale yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphale.
S06adsp70-u:197_93: yadi vā anāgāmiphale. yadi vā arhattve. yadi vā pratyekabodhau. yadi vā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ. yadi vā sattvaparipāke yadi vā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau,
S06adsp70-u:197_94: tasya te. ime kuśalā dharmā alpakṛcchreṇa prādurbhaviṣyanti prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ caratah:
S06adsp70-u:197_95: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06adsp70-u:197_100: yañ ca teśāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti.
S06adsp70-u:197_101: tasya jātivyativṛttasya api na jātu vipraṇaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:197_104: ahīnendriyo. yadi vā kāyendriyeṇa yadi vā vāgindriyeṇa:
S06adsp70-u:197_105: yadi vā manaindriyeṇa. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvākārajñatā satatasamitaṃ subhāvitā,
S06adsp70-u:197_107: subhāvitā bhavanti: yadi vā śrāvakamārgo yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārgo yadi vā bodhisattvamārgaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:197_108: tasya abhijñā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitam upakārībhūtā bhavanty avipraṇāśayogena.
S06adsp70-u:197_109: sa tāsu vipākīyāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:197_110: na ca parihīyate paṃcagatike saṃsāre saṃsaran.
S06adsp70-u:197_111: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthito upāyakauśalena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:197_112: sa tayā prajñāpāramitayā subhāvitayā sattvān evam avavadaty evaṃ
S06adsp70-u:197_113: anuśāsti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yad yad eva karma karoṣi.
S06adsp70-u:197_114: kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā tat sarvaṃ prakṛtiśūnyam (AdSPG II 77) evaṃ pratyavekṣasva,
S06adsp70-u:197_115: tasya te sarvaṃ karmāmṛtaphalaṃ bhaviṣyaty amṛtaparyavāsanaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:197_116: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:197_118: [f. 289a] tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prakṛtiśūnyatā parihīyate nāpi prakṛtiśūnyatāyā kaścid dharmaḥ parihīyate.
S06adsp70-u:197_119: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prakṛtiśūnyatā na bhāvo na abhāvaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:197_121: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvān avavadaty anuśāsti.
S06adsp70-u:197_122: evam avavadann evam anuśāsan na jātv akarmako bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:197_123: sa ātmanā ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu satatasamitaṃ vartate.
S06adsp70-u:197_126: ātmanā ca. prathamadhyānaṃ samāpadyate paraṃ ca prathame dhyāne samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_127: evaṃ yāvac caturthe dhyāne. ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihārī bhavati paraṃ ca satatasamitaṃ maitrībhāvanāyāṃ samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_132: evaṃ yāvad āryāṣṭāṅge mārge. ātmanā ca daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu śikṣate.
S06adsp70-u:197_137: na ca tatra avatiṣṭhate. paraṃ ca srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_139: ātmanā ca anuttarasyām: samyaksaṃbodher mārgam utpādayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_140: paraṃ ca tatra mārge 'vadaty anuśāsti niveśayati.
S06adsp70-u:197_141: vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena na kadācit karma na karoti.
S06adsp70-u:198_0: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ. prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvam upalabhyate,
S06adsp70-u:198_1: na dharmo na adharmas, tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvākārajñatāyaiḥ saṃpratiṣṭhate?
S06adsp70-u:199_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, tathā yathā vadasi, prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, na ca prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ sattvam upalabhyate,
S06adsp70-u:199_2: yadi punaḥ subhūte naprakṛtiśūnyā sarvadharmāḥ bhaveyur na bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhet.
S06adsp70-u:199_3: na asya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya prakṛtiśūnyān dharmān deśayet.
S06adsp70-u:199_4: rūpaṃ subhūte prakṛtiśūnyaṃ, vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ subhūte prakṛtiśūnyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:199_5: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pañcaskandhāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:199_6: aṣṭādaśadhātavo dvādaśāyatanāni prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:199_7: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga prakṛtiśūnya iti dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:199_10: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā dvātṛṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītir anuvyañjanāni prakṛtiśūnyān iti dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:199_14: yadi punaḥ subhūte 'dhyātmaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharman deśayiṣyan.
S06adsp70-u:199_15_0: evaṃ bahirddhāśūnyatā ādhyātmabahirddhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā
S06adsp70-u:199_15_1: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā atyantaśūnyatā anavarāgraśūnyatā avakāraśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatā
S06adsp70-u:199_15_2: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyā bhavet? tad vināśitā prakṛtiśūnyatā bhaven,
S06adsp70-u:199_17: na kūṭastho bhavati. nāpi sā punar avakrāmati. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi sā deśasthā na pradeśasthā,
S06adsp70-u:199_18: na hi sā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati.
S06adsp70-u:199_19: eṣā sā dharmasthititā yatra na kasyacid dharmasya ācayo vā apacayo vā upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:199_20: hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho vā saṃkleśo vā vayavadānaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:199_21: eṣā sā prakṛtir dharmāṇāṃ yatra sthitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhante.
S06adsp70-u:199_22: na ca kasyacid dharmasya (AdSPG II 79) prasthānaṃ samanupaśyati na aprasthānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:199_23: asaṃprasthitā. asthitā hi sarvadharmāḥ. eṣā sā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthitā,
S06adsp70-u:199_24: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān prakṛtiśūnyān dṛṣṭvā na pratyudāvarttate 'nuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06adsp70-u:199_25: tat kasya hetos? tathā hi sa na kasyacid dharmasya āvaraṇaṃ samanupaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:199_28_0: yatra prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ na sattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ na ātmā na jīvo
S06adsp70-u:199_28_1: na poṣo na pudgalo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na kārako na kārāpako na vedako
S06adsp70-u:199_28_2: na vedayitā na utthāpako na janako na paśyaka upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:199_29: na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:199_30: evam ādhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ yāvad aśītir anuvyañjanāni.
S06adsp70-u:200_0: (VIII 5,8) tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito nirmitasya bhikṣor bhikṣuṇyā vā upāsakasya vā upāsikāyā vā anuprabandhaṃ kalpaniyutaṃ dharman deśayet,
S06adsp70-u:200_1_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te nirmitā bhavyā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptuṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam
S06adsp70-u:200_1_1: anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā anuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāptuṃ?
S06adsp70-u:201_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. tat kasya hetos? tathā hi teṣāṃ vastu nāsti.
S06adsp70-u:202_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. avastukānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katama sa sattvo
S06adsp70-u:202_0_1: yam bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niveśayet srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale
S06adsp70-u:202_0_2: vā arhattve vā pratyekabodhau vā anuttarāyāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06adsp70-u:202_1: anyatra viparyāsaparyavanaddhaḥ prajñā aviparyāse niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:202_2: ya eva viparyāsa sa eva aviparyāsa.
S06adsp70-u:202_3: kalpaniṣyandam upādāya. avikalpaś ca aviparyāsa, yatra viparyāso nāsti tatra na ātmā na sattvo yāvan na janako na paśyakaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:202_4: tatra na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ yāvan na bodhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:202_5: yatra na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:202_6: yāvan na bodhiḥ, eṣā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā. yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran viparyāsāṃ sattvān sattvasaṃjñāyāṃ mocayati.
S06adsp70-u:202_9: (AdSPG II 80) ye 'pi te [f. 290a] anāsravā dharmās tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni.
S06adsp70-u:202_10: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvārarddhipādā pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṃgāny āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga triṇi vimokṣamukhāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:202_12: yaduta asaṃskṛtam anutpādaḥ abhāvaḥ aprādurbhāvaḥ eṣā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06adsp70-u:202_14: yatra na sattvo yāvan na janako na paśyakaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:202_15: na rūpaṃ na vedanā sa saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:202_16: evaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ. yāvad aśītir anuvyañjanāni. na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārgasya kṛte 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye 'bhipratiṣṭhate.
S06adsp70-u:202_18: sā api prakṛtiśūnyatā pūrve vā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06adsp70-u:202_19: paścād vā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā. madhye vā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā, na sā jātu na prakṛtiśūnyatā.
S06adsp70-u:202_20: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāpāramitāsu caraṃ sattvānāṃ sattvasaṃjñīnāṃ sarvasaṃjñāpramokṣaṇa arthaṃ mārgākārajñātāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:202_23: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvamārgān paripūrya sattvāṃ paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya āyuhsaṃskārān adhiṣṭāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp70-u:202_26: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantas teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyaṃ buddhanetrī yaduta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06adsp70-u:202_27: ye 'pi te anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti buddhā bhagavantas teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyaṃ buddhanetrī yaduta prakṛtiśūnyatā:
S06adsp70-u:202_28: ye 'pi te etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyaṃ buddhanetri yaduta prakṛtiśūnyatā.
S06adsp70-u:202_29: na hy anyataḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā lokaprādurbhāvo bhavaty anyatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt,
S06adsp70-u:202_31: yatra caraṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate sarvākārajñatayā.
S06adsp70-u:203_1: subhūtir āha: āścaryam idaṃ bhagavaṃ. bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yatra hi nāma evaṃ prakṛtiśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu caranti.
S06adsp70-u:203_12: yāvad bodhir eva prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyataiva bodhiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:204_0: bhagavān āha: yadi subhūte anyad rūpaṃ bhaved anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā.
S06adsp70-u:204_2: yāvad anyā bodhir bhaved anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā.
S06adsp70-u:204_3: yadi subhūte rūpaṃ na prakṛtiśūnyaṃ bhaven na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃsamyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeta.
S06adsp70-u:204_4: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā, yadi vijñānaṃ na prakṛtiśūnyaṃ bhaven na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta,
S06adsp70-u:204_6: 290b] śūnyatā bhaven na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta.
S06adsp70-u:204_7: yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:204_8: yāvad bodhiḥ prakṛtiśūnyā: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyān sarvadharmān viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp70-u:204_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy atra kaścid dharmo vinaśyati vā kūṭastho vā bhavaty avakrāmati vā,
S06adsp70-u:204_10: anyatra sadevako lokaḥ samārakaḥ sabrahmakaḥ so mūḍhaḥ idaṃ rūpam ahaṃ rūpaṃ mama rūpaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:204_11: yāvad idaṃ vijñānam ahaṃ vijñānaṃ mama vijñānaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:204_12: te rūpam abhiniviśya yāvad vijñānam abhiniviśya ahaṃkāramamakārayoś caranti.
S06adsp70-u:204_13: ahaṃkāramamakārayor abhiniviśya adhyātmikabāhyeṣu (AdSPG II 82) vastuṣv abhiniviśyante,
S06adsp70-u:204_17: na parimucyante. pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prakṛtiśūnyatāpāramitāsu caran rūpaṃ na vikopayati.
S06adsp70-u:204_18: śūnyaṃ vā na vāśūnyam iti. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān, vijñānaṃ na vikopayati. śūnyaṃ vā na vāśūnyam iti. yāvad bodhiṃ na vikopayati śūnyaṃ vā na vāśūnyam iti.
S06adsp70-u:204_19: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi rūpaśūnyatā rūpaṃ vikopayati.
S06adsp70-u:204_20: idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ rūpaśūnyatā yāvad iyaṃ vijñānam iyaṃ vijñānaśūnyatā yāvad iyaṃ bodhir iyaṃ boddhiśūnyatā.
S06adsp70-u:204_21: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte na ākāśam ākāśaṃ vikopayati.
S06adsp70-u:204_23: na bāhyam ākāśam ādhyātmikam ākāśaṃ vikopayati.
S06adsp70-u:204_24: evam eva subhūte na rūpaṃ śūnyatāṃ vikopayati.
S06adsp70-u:204_29: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy eṣāṃ svabhāvo 'sti ya evaṃ vikopayed.
S06adsp70-u:204_30: idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ śūnyatā iyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānam iyaṃ śūnyatā yāvad iyaṃ bodhir iyaṃ śūnyatā.
S06adsp70-u:205_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann abhedaḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:205_1_0: kuto bodhisattvo mahāsattva saṃprasthito 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya
S06adsp70-u:205_1_1: iti? na ca bhagavan dvaidhīkāro bodhir na ca dvidhīkurvatā śakyam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp70-u:206_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etad, na dvaye carato bodhir na dvaidhīkāro bodhi,
S06adsp70-u:206_2: na subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhir dvaidhīkāre carati bodhir iti bodhisattva iti vā.
S06adsp70-u:206_3: sā ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhir na rūpe carati.
S06adsp70-u:206_4: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati.
S06adsp70-u:206_5: yāvan na bodhau carati. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi bodhir aham iti vā mamaiti vā,
S06adsp70-u:206_7: ahaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣv ahaṃ vijñāne careyaṃ mama vijñānaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:206_8: (AdSPG II 83) yāvad ahaṃ bodhau careyaṃ mama bodhiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:206_9: na ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhir ugṛhṇe vā anudgṛhṇe vā carati.
S06adsp70-u:207_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhir na udgṛhṇe carati na anudgṛhṇe.
S06adsp70-u:208_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kuha tathāgatasya nirmitasya bodhiś carati.
S06adsp70-u:210_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte arhataḥ svapnāntaragatasya buddhi.
S06adsp70-u:211_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann, api tu khalu bhagavan yady atyantato 'rhan na svapiti kuta punar asya svapne buddhiś cariṣyaty udgṛhṇe vā anudgṛhṇe vā?
S06adsp70-u:212_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte na bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiś caraty udgṛhṇe va anudgṛhṇe vā.
S06adsp70-u:213_0: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhir na udgṛhṇe carati na anudgṛhṇe carati.
S06adsp70-u:213_1: na rūpe carati. yāvan na sarvākārajñātāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp70-u:213_2: na punar bhagavan [f. 291a] bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśabhūmiṣu carati.
S06adsp70-u:213_3_0: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu saptatriṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu caturdaśasu
S06adsp70-u:213_3_1: śūnyatāsu dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu yāvad aśītyānuvyaṃjaneṣu
S06adsp70-u:213_3_2: pañcasv abhijñāsu sthitvā buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati.
S06adsp70-u:213_5: na ca bhagavann asthitvā daśasu bhūmiṣu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yāvat pañcasv abhijñāsu,
S06adsp70-u:213_6: bodhisattvanyāmam anavakramya buddhakṣetram apariśodhya sattvān aparipācya śakyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp70-u:214_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etad yathā vadasi,
S06adsp70-u:214_1: na ṣakyam aparipūrya daśabhūmī ṣaṭpāramitāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattīś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvad āryāṣṭaṅgaṃ mārgaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:214_4: yāvad aśītim anuvyañjanāni pañcābhijñā śakyam aparipūrya asaṃpramoṣadharmatāṃ sadopekṣavihāritāṃ sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp70-u:214_5: tat khalu punaḥ subhūte rūpaprakṛtau (AdSPG II 84) sthitvā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaprakṛtau sthitvā yāvad bodhiprakṛtau sthitvā.
S06adsp70-u:214_6: sā ca prakṛtir upaśānta. na kasyacid dharmasya ācayaṃ vā karoty apacayaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:214_7: utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā prāptiṃ vā abhisamayaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:215_0: (VIII 5,9) tat khalu punaḥ subhūte lokavyavahāraprajñaptidharmatām upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp70-u:215_1: na punaḥ paramārthena kiṃcid asti rūpam vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yāvad bodhir vā,
S06adsp70-u:215_2: yo vā bodhau caret, sarva ete dharmā lokavyavahāratām upādāya prajñaptā na punaḥ paramārthena.
S06adsp70-u:215_6: na sattvān na bodhiṃ na buddhaṃ na bodhisattvaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:215_7: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yasmin samaye subhūtinā satkāyadṛṣṭiprahāṇāyendriyāṇi pratilabdhāny ānantaryo vā samādhiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāptaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:215_8: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā prāptaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:215_9: api nu tasmin samaye svapno vā upalabdhaś cittaṃ vā mārgo vā phalaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:216_0: bhagavān āha: tat kathaṃ punas te ājñāvyākṛtā subhūtinā arhattvaṃ prāptam iti?
S06adsp70-u:218_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte lokavyavahāreṇa bodhisattvaḥ prajñapto,
S06adsp70-u:218_4: na punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kaścid dharmo upalabdho yasya dharmasya ācayaṃ vā kuryād apacayaṃ vā upakāraṃ vā kuryād apakāraṃ vā dharmaprakṛtim upādāya.
S06adsp70-u:218_7: yāvad daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ ṣaṭpāramitā saptatriṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyān dharmān upalapsyate.
S06adsp70-u:218_8: śūnyatāsamādhim ānimittaṃ samādhiṃ apraṇihitaṃ (AdSPG II 85) samādhim upalapsyate.
S06adsp70-u:218_10: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo [f.
S06adsp70-u:218_11: 291b] 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau caritvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:220_1: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran saptatriṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu tṛṣu vimokṣamukheṣv aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrveṣu samāpattiṣu.
S06adsp70-u:220_2_0: daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyām
S06adsp70-u:220_2_1: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caraṃś caturdaśasu śūnyatāsu caraṃ bodhimārgaṃ
S06adsp70-u:220_3: kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06adsp70-u:221_0: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:221_1: na ca dānam upalabhate na dānapatiṃ na pratigrāhakaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:221_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp70-u:221_5: punar aparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṇc chīlapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:221_6: na ca śīlam upalabhate na śīlavantaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:221_9: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp70-u:221_10: punar aparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:221_11: na ca kṣāntim upalabhate na kṣamiṇaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:221_14: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotyate.
S06adsp70-u:221_15: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:221_16: na ca vīryam upalabhate na vīryavantaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:221_19: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāñ carann upāyakauśalena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp70-u:221_20: punar aparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:221_21: na ca dhyānam upalabhate na dhyāyinaṃ nāpy (AdSPG II 86) anyatraitābhyāṃ dharmābhyāñ carati.
S06adsp70-u:221_23: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp70-u:221_24: punar aparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06adsp70-u:221_25: na ca prajñām upalabhate na prājñaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:221_28: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06adsp70-u:221_29: evaṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu kartavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:222_1: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yogam āpadyate?
S06adsp70-u:223_0: bhagavān aha: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena [f.
S06adsp70-u:223_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpasya svabhāvo nāsti yaṃ yojayed vā viyojayed vā,
S06adsp70-u:223_3: yāvan na vijñānaṃ yojayati na viyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:223_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi vijñānasya svabhāvo nāsti yaṃ yojayed vā viyojayed vā,
S06adsp70-u:223_5: yāvan na dānapāramitāṃ yojayati na viyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:223_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi dānapāramitāyāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yaṃ yojayed vā viyojayed vā,
S06adsp70-u:223_7: yāvan na prajñāpāramitāṃ yojayati na viyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:223_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yaṃ yojayed vā viyojayed vā.
S06adsp70-u:223_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yaṃ yojayed vā viyojayed vā.
S06adsp70-u:224_0: āha: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate yaṃ yojayed vā viyojayed vā.
S06adsp70-u:224_2: yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ? na ca aśikṣitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śakyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp70-u:225_1: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāradvatīputra evam etat,
S06adsp70-u:225_2: tathā yathā vadasi, na śakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām aśikṣitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
S06adsp70-u:225_4: yadi śāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvam upalabheta tad udgṛhṇīyāt.
S06adsp70-u:225_5_0: atha nopalabhate. tat kiṃ grahīṣyati. iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā iyaṃ samādhipāramitā iyaṃ
S06adsp70-u:225_5_1: vīryapāramitā iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā iyaṃ śīlapāramitā iyaṃ dānapāramitā idaṃ rupaṃ
S06adsp70-u:225_5_2: yāvad idaṃ vijñānaṃ yāvad ime buddhadharmāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:225_7: tat kiṃ grahīsyati, agrāhyā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp70-u:225_9: iyaṃ śāradvatīputra pāramitā agrāhyā pāramitā yaduta prajñāpāramitā.
S06adsp70-u:225_11: yatra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattva śikṣām api nopalapsyate.
S06adsp70-u:225_12: kuto bodhiṃ. kutaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ kuto bodhisattvadharmān kuto buddhadharmān kutaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ kutaḥ śrāvakadharmān kutaḥ pṛthagjanadharmān.
S06adsp70-u:225_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi śāradvatīputra na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate.
S06adsp70-u:225_14: evam asvabhāvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ katamaḥ srotaāpanna.
S06adsp70-u:225_15: katamaḥ sakṛdāgāmī katamo 'nāgamī katamo 'rhan katama pratyekabuddhaḥ katamo bodhisattvaḥ katamas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:225_18: yai dharmair nirdiśyate. pṛthagjano vā srotaāpanno vā yāvad arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha.
S06adsp70-u:226_0: āha: avastukānāṃ bhagavaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kutaḥ āgamaḥ prajñāsyate.
S06adsp70-u:226_1: ayaṃ pṛthagjano yāvad ayaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:227_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ śāradvatīputra rūpasya vastv asti? bhūto bhāvo yatra bālapithagjanā abhiniviṣṭāḥ?
S06adsp70-u:228_1: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann anyatra viparyāsāt.
S06adsp70-u:229_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ śāradvatīputra vedanāyā saṃjñāyā saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya vastv asti bhūto bhāvo yatra bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭā?
S06adsp70-u:230_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann anyatra viparyāsāt.
S06adsp70-u:231_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ [f. 292b] śāradvatīputra yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ vastv asti bhūto bhāvo yatra bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭāḥ?
S06adsp70-u:232_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann anyatra viparyāsāt.
S06adsp70-u:233_0: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāratvatīputra evam etat.
S06adsp70-u:233_1: viparyāsena sattvā avastukān sarvadharmān bhāvataḥ kalpayanti.
S06adsp70-u:233_2: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena avastukān sarvadharmān paśyann anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:234_0_0: (VIII 5,11) āha: katamad bhagavaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upāyakauśalaṃ yena
S06adsp70-u:234_0_1: upāyakauśalena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avastukān sarvadharmān paśyann anuttarasyai
S06adsp70-u:235_0: bhagavān āha: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kasyacid dharmasya vastu samanupaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:235_1: yatra vastuni pratihanyeta, yatra vā pratihanyamāno 'valīyeta:
S06adsp70-u:235_2: avalīyamānaḥ saṃsīdet saṃsīdan visīded visīdaṃ kausīdyam āpadyeta:
S06adsp70-u:235_3: yasmāt tarhi śāradvatīputra avastukā ajīvā nirjīvā.
S06adsp70-u:235_5: sarvadharmāḥ, anyatra saṃmohe na sattvā abhiniviṣṭā skandhā iti vā dhātava iti vā āyatanāni iti vā,
S06adsp70-u:235_6: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ abhāvasvabhāvān sarvadharmān saṃpaśyan prakṛtiśūnyān svalakṣaṇaśūnyān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran.
S06adsp70-u:235_7: māyākārasadṛśam ātmabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:235_9: teṣān dānakathāṃ karoti, duśśīlānāṃ śīlakathāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ kṣāntikathāṃ kusīdānāṃ vīryakathāṃ vikṣiptacittānāṃ samādhikathāṃ duṣprajñānāṃ prajñākathāṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:235_10: yadā te sattvā dāne pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti.
S06adsp70-u:235_12: tadā teṣāṃ (AdSPG II 89) sattvānām uttarikathāṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:235_13: āryāṃ nairyāṇikīṃ nairvedhikīṃ yayā kathayā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpnuvanti.
S06adsp70-u:236_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aupalaṃbhiko bhavati ya asato 'saṃvidyamānān sattvān dāne niyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:236_1: yāvat prajñāyāṃ niyojayati. uttari ca āryāṃ nairyāṇikīṃ kathāṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:237_0: bhagavān āha: na khalu punaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kaścid upalaṃbhaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:237_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcit sattvam upalabhate.
S06adsp70-u:237_3: tatra śāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dvayo satyayo sthitvā sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:237_5: na hi śāradvatīputra dvayo satyayoḥ sattvam upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:237_6: api tu khalu punar upāyakauśalena bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran.
S06adsp70-u:237_7: sattvānān dharman deśayati. tat te sattvā dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānaṃ nopalabhante,
S06adsp70-u:237_8: prāg eva yat prāpsyanti yena vā prāpsyanti.
S06adsp70-u:237_10: 293a] prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:238_0: āha: mahotpādo vatāyaṃ bhagavan yaduta bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:238_1: na ca nāma bhagavaṃ kasyacid dharmasya ekatvaṃ vā nānātvaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:238_2: nāpi pṛthaktvam upalabhyate. evaṃrūpaṃ ca sannāhaṃ sannahyati yena sannāhena sannaddhena na kāmadhātau saṃdṛśyate.
S06adsp70-u:238_3: na rūpadhātau. nārūpyadhātau na saṃskṛtadhātau na asaṃskṛtadhātau saṃdṛśyate.
S06adsp70-u:238_4: sattvāṃś ca traidhātukāṃ. parimocayati. na ca sattvo na sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate:
S06adsp70-u:238_8: gatyasaṃbhedatāyāṃ na (AdSPG II 90) ca karma na kleśaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:238_10: yena vipākena ātmā vā sattvo vā pañcagatike saṃsāre saṃdṛśyeta.
S06adsp70-u:239_0: bhagavān āha: evam etac chāradvatīputra evam etad yathā vācaṃ bhāṣase.
S06adsp70-u:239_1: sacet pūrvaṃ sattvo 'bhaviṣyat paścān na abhaviṣyat,
S06adsp70-u:239_2: tat syād eṣa doṣo, bodhisattvasya api tathāgatasya api.
S06adsp70-u:239_3: evaṃ pūrvaṃ bhāva paścād abhāva iti.
S06adsp70-u:239_4: tat syād eṣa doṣaḥ, pañcagatiko vā saṃsāro pūrvaṃ bhāvo 'bhaviṣyat paścād abhāvo vā,
S06adsp70-u:239_5_0: tat syād eṣa doṣo. yasmāt tarhi śāradvatīputra utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād
S06adsp70-u:239_5_1: vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathatā avitathatā yatra na ātmā
S06adsp70-u:239_5_2: na sattvo na jīvo na pudgalo na kārako na kārāpakaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:239_6: tatra kuto rūpaṃ bhaviṣyati kuto vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā kuto vijñānaṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:239_7: asastveteṣu dharmeṣu kutaḥ pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:239_9_0: yasmāt tarhi śāradvatīputra ime dharmā īdṛśāḥ svabhāvaśūnyā tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp70-u:239_9_1: paurvakānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutvā anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye 'bhipratiṣṭhate,
S06adsp70-u:239_10: na hy atra kaścid dharmo yaṃ vayam upalabhemahi.
S06adsp70-u:239_14: yena sannāhena sannaddhena na pratyudāvartate 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06adsp70-u:239_19_0: tadyathāpi nāma māyākāranirmitaḥ puruṣaḥ bahūni prāṇikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi nirmāya
S06adsp70-u:239_19_1: prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyena saṃtarpayet saṃtarpya udānam udānayed bahum eva puṇyaṃ
S06adsp70-u:239_19_2: prasūtaṃ bahum eva puṇyaṃ prasūtam iti.
S06adsp70-u:239_20: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputra kaścit atra bhojito vā saṃtarpito vā?
S06adsp70-u:241_1: bhagavān āha: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu.
S06adsp70-u:241_3: caturṣv iddhipādeṣu pañcasv indriyeṣu pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣv āryāṣṭāṃge mārge caturdaśasu śūnyatāsu triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu,
S06adsp70-u:241_4: daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyām aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran bodhimārgaṃ [f.
S06adsp70-u:241_5: 293b] paripūrayan buddhakṣetraṃ pariṣodhayati sattvāñ ca paripācayati,
S06adsp70-u:242_1: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhimārga yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayitavyaṃ?
S06adsp70-u:243_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caraṃc chīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:243_1: vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caraṃ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
S06adsp70-u:244_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati?
S06adsp70-u:245_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvebhyo dānan dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:245_1: dānan dattvā evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti,
S06adsp70-u:245_2: iha kulaputra mā dānaṃ grāhato gṛhītaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:245_4: yena ātmabhāvena abhinirvṛttena bahūni duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyatha.
S06adsp70-u:245_5: neha kulaputra parmārthena dānaṃ na dānaphalaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:245_9: agrāhyā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvebhyo dānan dadāti na ca tatra dānam upalabhate.
S06adsp70-u:245_12: sa imān sarvāṃs trīn dharmān anupalabhamānaḥ sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:245_13: sakṛdāgāmiphale. anāgāmiphale arhattve pratyekabodhāv anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:245_14: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati.
S06adsp70-u:245_15: sa ātmanā ca dānan dadāti parāṃś ca dāne samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:245_16: dānasya ca vamaṃ bhāṣate, ye ca anye sattvā dānan dadanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:245_17: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃrūpaṃ mahādānan dattvā ksatriyamahāsālakulānāṃ vā sabhāgatāyai upapadyate.
S06adsp70-u:245_20: koṭṭarājā vā bhavati cakravartir vā bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:245_22: tatra tān sattvāṃś caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:245_23: katamaiś caturbhiḥ? dānena priyavacanena arthakriyayā samānārthatayā ca.
S06adsp70-u:245_24: sattvān dānena saṃgṛhītān anupūrveṇa śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:245_25: samādhau prajñāyāṃ, caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛsv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu.
S06adsp70-u:245_26: yāvat saptatriṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu śūnyatāyām ānimitte apraṇihite samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:245_27: samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāmati. yāvad arhattvaṃ prāpayati pratyekabodhiṃ prāpayaty anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:245_29: tatra na kaścid dharma. svabhāvena saṃvidyate. yatrasattvāḥ sattvāḥ anyatra viparyāsebhyaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:245_32: parāṃ ca mocayata, evaṃ yūyam ātmanaś ca mahāntam arthaṃ kariṣyatha,
S06adsp70-u:245_34: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:245_38: tat kasya hetoḥ? yādṛśaṃ bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:245_39: tasya khalu punaś cakravartino ye yācanakā (AdSPG II 93) ye yācanakā āgacchanti tasya cakravartirājyasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06adsp70-u:245_40: nānyasya mayā kṛte cakravarttitvaṃ parigṛhītam anyatra sattvānām arthāya.
S06adsp70-u:245_41: sa bravīti yasya yena arthas tad yuṣmadbhyaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu,
S06adsp70-u:245_42: yuṣmākam eva tan na mama. anenāpy anarthiko 'smy adhyātmikena rūpeṇa prāg eva anyena.
S06adsp70-u:245_43: anyatra mayā sattvānām arthāya saṃsāra upādattaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:245_44: sa karuṇāyamāno mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrya yāvan mahākaruṇayā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:245_45: tāṃś ca sattvān nopalabhate. ye pariniṣpannā bhaveyuḥ. anyatra saṃjñāsamajñāsaṃketena vyavahārati.
S06adsp70-u:245_46: sa ca vyavahāraḥ pratiśrutkopamaḥ avyavahāro veditavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:245_47: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:245_48: yathā carato na kiṃcit sattvānām antike aparityaktaṃ bhavaty antaśaḥ ātmanaḥ māṃsāny api,
S06adsp70-u:247_0: bhagavān āha: dānapāramitā upakaraṇaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā upakaraṇaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:247_2: imāni tāny upakaraṇāni yair upakaraṇair anugṛhītā sattvāḥ saṃsārāt parimucyante.
S06adsp70-u:247_3: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvebhyo dānaṃ dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:247_4: sa tad dānan dadann evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate.
S06adsp70-u:247_5: eta yūyaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣata, ahaṃ yuṣmākam avaikalyaṃ kariṣyāmy,
S06adsp70-u:247_6: annena vā pānena vā yāvad anyatarānyataraiḥ pariṣkāraiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:247_9: annena vā pānena vā yāvat saptabhir ratnaiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:247_10: tad yūyaṃ saṃvaraśīle sthitvā anupūrveṇa duḥkhasya antaṃ kariṣyathaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:247_11: tṛbhir yānaiḥ, śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā sarvākārajñatājñānena6vā.
S06adsp70-u:247_12: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ (AdSPG II 94) sthitvā śīlapāramitāyā sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:247_13: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā ye sattvā kupyanti vyāpadyante teṣāṃ sattvānām evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate.
S06adsp70-u:247_14: kena yūyaṃ kāraṇena kulaputrā vyāpadyadhve tena yūyaṃ vaikalyena vyāpadyadhve tad mamāntikād gṛhṇītaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:247_16: annena vā pānena vā yāvad anyatarānyataraiḥ pariṣkārair,
S06adsp70-u:247_17: yena na kopiṣyatha [f. 294b] na vyāpatsyadhve, tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā tān sattvān kṣāntau niyojayati.
S06adsp70-u:247_18: nātra kaścid bhāvo 'sti yo 'tra sāra yena yuṣmākaṃ krodha utpadyate,
S06adsp70-u:247_19: abhūtaparikalpa eṣa krodha, naivātra kiṃcid vastv asti yasya yūyaṃ vastunaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:247_20: kṛte abhiyujyatha. kupyatha vyāpadyadhve. abhiṣajya kupitvā vyāpadya daṇḍena vā prahāratha śastreṇa vā prahāratha.
S06adsp70-u:247_22: tad yūyam abhūtaparikalpena kṣubhitā narakaṃ vā prapatiṣyatha.
S06adsp70-u:247_23: tiryagyoniṃ vā. yamakokaṃ vā, yā api kaścid anyā durgatayaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:247_24: yatra yūyaṃ duḥkhās tīvrā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayiṣyatha.
S06adsp70-u:247_25: haṃ bho puruṣā mā avastukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛte.
S06adsp70-u:247_26: tat karma parigrahīṣyatha. yena karmaṇā parigṛhītena manuṣyapratilaṃbho na bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:247_28: duhrlabha khalu mārṣa buddhotpāda durlabho manuṣyapratilaṃbhaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:247_30: mā vicikitsā bhaviṣyatha. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattva (AdSPG II 95) ātmanā ca kṣāntyā saṃpādayati.
S06adsp70-u:247_31: parañ ca kṣāntau niyojayati kṣāntyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06adsp70-u:247_34: tatra tān sattvān kṣāntyā niyojya kṣāntau sthāpayitvā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:247_35: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:247_36: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān vīryapāramitāyāṃ niyojayati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvān kusīdān viditvā evaṃ bravīti,
S06adsp70-u:247_38: ta evaṃ brūvanti, pratyayavaikalyena. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃcaraṃs tān sattvān evaṃ bravīti.
S06adsp70-u:247_39: haṃ bho puruṣa ahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ sarvapratyayān upasaṃhariṣyāmi.
S06adsp70-u:247_40: yadi vā dānapratyayān yadi vā śīlapratyayān yadi vā kṣāntipratyayān yair vā yair ākārair vīryam ārapsyadhve.
S06adsp70-u:247_42: tatra te sattvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopakaraṇair vīryam ārabhante.
S06adsp70-u:247_43: kāyikaṃ vā caitasikaṃ vā, tena kāyikena caitasikena vīryeṇa sarvakuśaladharmān paripūrayanti.
S06adsp70-u:247_44: yaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ āryān anāsravān dharmān bhāvayanti.
S06adsp70-u:247_45: yān bhāvayantaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāpnuvanti sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiṃ prāpnuvanti.
S06adsp70-u:247_47: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:247_48_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:247_48_1: sattvān niyojayati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvān vikṣiptacittān dṛṣṭvā
S06adsp70-u:247_49: kim iti bhoḥ sattvā dhyānāni na samāpadyadhve.
S06adsp70-u:247_50: ta evaṃ brūvanti. pratyayavaikalyena, tān etāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo evaṃ braviti.
S06adsp70-u:247_51: ahaṃ bhoḥ sattvās tān pratyayān upasaṃhariṣye.
S06adsp70-u:247_53: adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃs tān pratyayān upasaṃharati.
S06adsp70-u:247_55: te ca sattvā vitarkaiś cchinnaiḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante.
S06adsp70-u:247_57: maitrīṃ [f. 295a] samāpadyante karuṇāṃ muditām upekṣāṃ samāpadyante.
S06adsp70-u:247_58: te tair dhyānair yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayanti.
S06adsp70-u:247_62: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā samādhipāramitāyāṃ sattvān saṃgṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:247_63: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃsattvān saṃgṛhṇāti? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān evaṃ bravīti.
S06adsp70-u:247_64: kim idaṃ bhoḥ sattvā yūyaṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata? ta evaṃ brūvanti,
S06adsp70-u:247_65: pratyayavaikalyena. tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān evam avavadati.
S06adsp70-u:247_67: mamāntikād upakaraṇāni parigṛhya dānāni dadadhvaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata vīryam ārabhadhvaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyadhvaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:247_68: tatraimān ākārān paripūrya evaṃ mīmāṃsadhvam asti kaścid dharmo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamānāyām upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:247_69_0: ātmā vā sattvo vā yāvat kārako vā kārapako vā rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā
S06adsp70-u:247_69_1: vā vijñānaṃ vā kāmadhātur vā rūpadhātur vā ārūpyadhātur vā sarvapāramitā saptatṛṃśad
S06adsp70-u:247_70: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā. anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:247_72: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcid dharmam upalabhate.
S06adsp70-u:247_73: yam upalabhya abhiniviśeta, so 'nabhiniviśamāno na kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:247_74_0: so 'nupalabhamāno na vikalpayati ayaṃ nairayiko vā tairyagyoniko vā yāmalaukiko vā
S06adsp70-u:247_74_1: ayam asurakāyiko vā devo vā manuṣyo vā ayaṃ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ
S06adsp70-u:247_74_2: sakṛdāgāmī ayam anāgāmī ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:247_75: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sattvān prajñāpāramitāyā saṃgṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:247_76_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:247_76_1: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā yāvat
S06adsp70-u:247_76_2: saptatṛṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyān dharmān parigṛhṇāti? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva
S06adsp70-u:247_77: yair upakaraṇair parigṛhītā sattvāś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti.
S06adsp70-u:247_81: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvān āryair anāsravair dharmaiḥ saṃgṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:247_82: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān anarthān duḥkhitān aśanavasanaviprahīṇān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ paripācayati.
S06adsp70-u:247_83: eta yūyaṃ kulaputrā mamāntikād annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā yānaṃ vā vastraṃ vā mālyagandhavilepanaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣayjapariṣkārān gṛhītaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:247_84: yāvat saptabhir ratnai. sattvān anugṛhṇīta, tad yuṣmākaṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya,
S06adsp70-u:247_85: mā ca evaṃ cintayata, asyai so 'rtho nāsmākam iti. dīrgharātram eṣo 'rtho mayā sattvānāṃ kṛte.
S06adsp70-u:247_86: arjita. tad yūyam ātmīyam eva cintayitvā [f.
S06adsp70-u:247_87_0: 295b] sattvebhyo dadata. tena ca dānena śīle niyojayati kṣāntau vīrye samādhau prajñāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:247_87_1: niyojayati yāvat saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu niyojayati triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu
S06adsp70-u:247_90: srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratyekabodhau 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp70-u:247_91: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā.
S06adsp70-u:247_93: yāvat saṃsārāt parimucyante. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā evaṃ sattvāḥ paripācayitavyā,
S06adsp70-u:247_96: annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakāṃ pariṣkārān,
S06adsp70-u:247_97: sa tān sattvāṃc chīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā tathārūpeṇa anugraheṇa anugṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:247_98: yathārūpeṇa anugraheṇa anugṛhītā (AdSPG II 98) sattvo daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante.
S06adsp70-u:247_99: tān akhaṇḍaśīlān yāvad aparāmṛṣṭaśīlān saṃvaraśīle pratiṣṭhāpya,
S06adsp70-u:249_1: katamaḥ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgo yatra sthitvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayam īdṛśaḥ sannāhaḥ sannaddhavyaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:250_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ subhūteś cetasaiva cetaḥ paṅvitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:250_2: saptatṛṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni caturdaśaśūnyatā aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni.
S06adsp70-u:250_4: api tu khalu subhūte sarvadharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:250_5: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte asti kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:250_6: yatra śikṣitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta? nāsti subhūte kaścid dharmo yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na śikṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:250_7: aśikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śaktaḥ sarākārajñātām anuprāptuṃ.
S06adsp70-u:251_1: kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate? na nu bhagavann aprapaṃcyaṃ prapaṃcayeti.
S06adsp70-u:251_2: iyanta iti vā ima iti vā, ime dharmā laukikā ime lokottarā.
S06adsp70-u:251_3: evaṃ sāsravā vā anāsravā vā. saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā. pṛthagjanadharmā vā yāvad arhandharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā.
S06adsp70-u:252_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ. yadi punaḥ subhūte
S06adsp70-u:252_0_1: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na abhaviṣyan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp70-u:252_1: yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ śūnyās tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp70-u:252_2: api tu khalu subhūte tad evaṃ vadasi:
S06adsp70-u:252_3: yadi sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanānātvaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:252_4: iyanta iti vā ima iti vā yāvat pṛthagjanadharmā vā yāvad arhaddharmā vā.
S06adsp70-u:252_6: iti. tat kaccit punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā evaṃ jānaṃti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti.
S06adsp70-u:252_7: yadi jānīyur nai [f. 296a] va bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt.
S06adsp70-u:252_8: yasmāt tarhi subhūte ete sattvā na jānanti sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti.
S06adsp70-u:252_9: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvadharmavyavasthānaṃ kṛtvā sattvānān dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:253_0: (VIII 5,13) tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhimārge caratā prathamata eva evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:253_1: na atra kaścid dharmaḥ svabhāvena upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:253_2: anyatra abhisaṃskārāt. tatra evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvam upaparīkṣeta.
S06adsp70-u:253_4: yadi vā pāramitāsu yadi vā saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu yadi vā srotaāpattiphale.
S06adsp70-u:253_5: yadi vā sakṛdāgāmiphale yadi vā anāgāmiphale yadi vā arhattve yadi vā pratyekabodhau yadi vā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp70-u:253_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi svabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā,
S06adsp70-u:253_10: evaṃ hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anabhiniviṣṭaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viharati.
S06adsp70-u:253_11: yatra śikṣāyāṃ sthitvā sarvāś caryā avalokayati kveme sattvāś caraṃti asadgrāhe,
S06adsp70-u:253_15: eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā dānaṃ dadadhvaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:253_17: bhogaiḥ, taiś ca bhogair mā maṃsyadhve,
S06adsp70-u:253_18: na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ śīle avavadati. eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvāḥ śīlaṃ rakṣata.
S06adsp70-u:253_20: na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ kṣāntau vīrye samādhāv avavadati eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvā samādhiṃ samāpadyadhvaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:253_22: na tatra kinicit sāram asti. evaṃ prajñāyām avavadati. eta (AdSPG II 100) bhoḥ sattvāḥ prajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ,
S06adsp70-u:253_24: na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. evaṃ srotaāpattiphale evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale evam anāgāmiphale evam arhattve evaṃ pratyekabodhau evaṃ buddhadharmeṣv avavadati.
S06adsp70-u:253_25: eta yūyaṃ bhoḥ sattvāḥ buddhadharmāṃ bhāvayataḥ,
S06adsp70-u:253_27: na tatra kiṃcit sāram asti. sa evam eva avavadann evam anuśāsan bodhisattvamārge carati.
S06adsp70-u:253_28: na ca kvacit abhiniviśate. tat kasya hetoḥ? anabhiniviṣṭā hi sarvadharmā,
S06adsp70-u:253_29: tathā hy eṣāṃ svabhāvo nāsti yena abhiniviśyeta.
S06adsp70-u:253_30: śūnyatāsvabhāvatām upādāya: tatra subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārge caran na kvacit pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:253_32: na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:253_33: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:253_34: vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:253_35: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:253_36: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:253_37: sa prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:253_38: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānena śūnyaṃ yo 'pi samāpadyeta so 'pi śūnyaḥ yair apy ākāraiḥ samāpadyate.
S06adsp70-u:253_39_0: te 'py ākārā śūnyā. evaṃ dvitīyam [f. 296b] tṛtīyaṃ caturtham evaṃ maitriṃ karuṇāṃ
S06adsp70-u:253_39_1: muditām upeksām ārūpyasamāpattīm aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06adsp70-u:253_40: na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ pratilabhate.
S06adsp70-u:253_41: na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati. anāgāmiphalaṃ pratilabhate na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:253_42: arhattvaṃ pratilabhate na ca tatra pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:255_0: bhagavān āha: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ na pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:255_1: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ? svabhāvaś ca teṣāṃ phalānāṃ nāsti yatra pratitiṣṭhet.
S06adsp70-u:255_2: yena vā pratitiṣṭhet. yo vā pratitiṣṭhet. na ca tanmātrakeṇa tuṣṭim āpadyate.
S06adsp70-u:255_4: na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ. yāvan na mayā arhattvaṃ na prāptavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:255_5: na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ. na mayā pratyekabuddhabhūmir na prāptavyā,
S06adsp70-u:255_6: na ca tatra sthātavyaṃ. yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye.
S06adsp70-u:255_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mayā prathamacittotpādam upādāya nānyaṃ cittaṃ pratilabdham anyatra anuttarasyā samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06adsp70-u:255_8: tat kasya (AdSPG II 101) hetoḥ? tathā hi mayā prathamam bhūmim upādāya na anyaṃ cittam utpāditam anyatra anuttarasyā samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06adsp70-u:255_9: evaṃ yāvad daśamī bhūmir yāvad bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntaḥ na anyaḥ kaści cittotpāda utpādito 'nyatra anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06adsp70-u:255_10: avikṣiptamanasā, subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad eva kāyena parākramate.
S06adsp70-u:255_12: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicitte sthitvā avikṣiptama.
S06adsp70-u:256_0: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ sarvadharmā anutpannās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati?
S06adsp70-u:257_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmā anutpannā, tat punaḥ katham iti. ye 'nābhisaṃskurvanti teṣāṃ sarvadharmā anutpannāḥ?
S06adsp70-u:258_0: āha: na nu punar bhagavann utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva dharmāṇān dharmasthiti?
S06adsp70-u:259_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaiva dharmāṇān dharmasthitiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:259_1: ye punar imāṃ dharmasthitiṃ na jānanti teṣām arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimārgam utpādayati.
S06adsp70-u:260_0: (VIII 5,14) āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann utpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06adsp70-u:262_0: āha: tad anutpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06adsp70-u:264_0: āha: tad utpannena anutpannena ca mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06adsp70-u:266_0: āha: tan naivotpannena naivānutpannena mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate?
S06adsp70-u:268_0: āha: tat kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ. bodhiḥ prāpyate.
S06adsp70-u:269_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte mārgeṇa bodhiḥ prāpyate. na amārgeṇa. bodhir eva mārgo mārga eva bodhiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:270_1: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ bodhir eva mārgo mārga eva bodhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:270_2: tat prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:270_4: dvātṛṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇair daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir yāvad aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ?
S06adsp70-u:271_0: bhagavān āha: [f. 297a] tat kiṃ manyase subhūte buddho bodhiṃ prāpnoti?
S06adsp70-u:272_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ, na buddho bodhiṃ prāpnoti. buddha eva bodhir bodhir eva buddhaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:273_0: bhagavān āha: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha. tat prāptaiva bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhir iti.
S06adsp70-u:273_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāṃ paripūrya saptatṛṃśataṃ bodhipakṣyāṃ dharmān paripūrya daśatathāgatabalāni.
S06adsp70-u:273_3: mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikāṃ buddhadharmān paripūrya vajropamena samādhinā ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajnayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp70-u:273_4: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ tadā tathāgata iti nirdiśyate.
S06adsp70-u:274_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati?
S06adsp70-u:275_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya.
S06adsp70-u:275_1: kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ vāgdauṣṭulyaṃ manodauṣṭulyam ātmanaś ca parasya ca pariśodhayati.
S06adsp70-u:276_0: āha: katamad bhagavan kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06adsp70-u:277_0: bhagavān āha: yat kāyakarmākuśalaṃ prāṇātipātaḥ ādattadānaṃ kāmamithyācāraḥ idaṃ kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp70-u:277_1: yad vākkarmākuśalaṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:277_3: yan manaskarmākuśale abhidhyā vyāpado mithyādṛṣṭi idaṃ manodauṣṭulyaṃ (AdSPG II 103) bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp70-u:277_4: punar aparaṃ subhūte yan matsaryacittam idaṃ manodauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06adsp70-u:277_5: yad dauśīlyacittaṃ kṣobhanācittaṃ kausīdyacittaṃ vikṣepacittam asamahitacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam idam api manodauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp70-u:277_6: punar aparaṃ subhūte yac chīlāpariśuddhim idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp70-u:277_7: punar aparaṃ subhūte yac caturbhir smṛtyupasthānair virahita idam api dauṣṭulyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp70-u:277_8: evaṃ caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhi ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balai saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa.
S06adsp70-u:277_9: śūnyatāyāḥ samādhinā ānimittena samādhinā apraṇihitena samādhinā virahita idam api dauṣṭulyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp70-u:277_10: punar aparaṃ subhūte yat srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyā tatra ca aspṛhaṇatā idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp70-u:277_12: spṛhaṇatā idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp70-u:277_13: punar aparaṃ subhūte rūpasaṃjñā dauṣṭulyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñā saṃjñāsaṃjñā saṃskārasaṃjñā vijñānasaṃjñā dauṣṭulyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:277_14: cakṣusaṃjñā srotrasaṃjñā ghrāṇasaṃjñā jihvasaṃjñā kāyasaṃjñā manaḥsaṃjñā idam api dauṣṭulyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06adsp70-u:277_18: kāmadhātusaṃjñā rūpadhātusaṃjñā arūpadhātusaṃjñā kuśalasaṃjñā akuśalasaṃjñā yāvat saṃskṛtasaṃjñā asaṃskṛtasaṃjñā idam api kāyadauṣṭulyaṃ vāgdauṣṭulyaṃ manodauṣṭulyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:277_19: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvāṇi tāni dauṣṭulyāni vivarjya ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti parāṃś ca dāne samādāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:277_21: pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo, yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇy upakaraṇārthikebhyo dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:277_23: pratiṣṭhāpayati. tataś ca yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayati.
S06adsp70-u:277_24: evaṃ śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ,
S06adsp70-u:277_25: yāvat sa ātmanā ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptabhir ratnaiḥ paripūrya tṛbhyo ratnebhyo dānaṃ dadāti,
S06adsp70-u:277_26: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty, anena me kuśalamūlena saptaratnamayaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ (AdSPG II 104) bhavatu.
S06adsp70-u:277_27: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāni vādyāni vādayati.
S06adsp70-u:277_29: tasvyaivaṃ bhavaty, anena kuśalamūlena tatra me buddhakṣetre divyāś śabdāḥ manojñā satatasamitaṃ vādyantāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:277_30: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ divyagandhaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhebhyo vā buddhacaityebhyo vā dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:277_31: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty, anena kuśalamūlena tatra me buddhakṣetre divyā gandhā pravāntu.
S06adsp70-u:277_32: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śatarasāni bhojanāni tathāgatebhyo vā tathāgataśrāvakebhyo vā dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:277_33: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty, anena kuśalamūlena tatra me buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya śrāvakasaṃghasya śatarasāni bhojanāny abhinirvartaṃtāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:277_34: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyāny anulepanāni dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:277_36: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty, anena kuśalamūlena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra me buddhakṣetre sarvasattvāni divyāḥ sparśā abhinirvartantām.
S06adsp70-u:277_37: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:277_38: manorathasaṃkalpair eva iṣṭān pañcakāmaguṇāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca upanāmayeyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:277_40: anena kuśalamūlena tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya sarvaśrāvakasaṃghasya sarvasattvānāṃ ca manorathasaṃkalpenaiva iṣṭāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāḥ prādurbhavanti.
S06adsp70-u:277_41: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ buddhebhyo vā śrāvakebhyo vā pañcakāmaguṇān dānan dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:277_42: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:277_43: yanv aham ātmanā ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyeya.
S06adsp70-u:277_46: pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ. maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyām upekṣayāṃ yāvat saptatṛṃśati bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu.
S06adsp70-u:277_47_0: tasya me 'nuttarasamyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya sarvasattvāś caturbhir dhyānair
S06adsp70-u:277_47_1: avirahitā bhaveyuś caturbhir apramāṇaiś caturbhir smṛtyupasthānair yāvat saptatṛṃśati
S06adsp70-u:277_48: evaṃ khalu subhūte [f. 298a] bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
S06adsp70-u:277_49: (AdSPG II 105) sa tāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp70-u:277_53: tasya abhirūpaḥ kāyo bhavaty apy ātmanaḥ api teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ye tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripācitā.
S06adsp70-u:277_55: kāyo 'bhinirvartate. yaduta puṇyaparigṛhītatvāt. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati.
S06adsp70-u:277_56: tathā ca pariśodhayati. yathā trayāṇām apāyānāṃ prajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:277_68: tyāgecchatāyā. sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ghoṣo niścariṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:277_69: yadi vādhyātmikānāṃ yadi vā bāhyānāṃ vāritānām evaṃ ghoṣo niścariṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:277_70: śūnyatā iti vā ānimittam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā.
S06adsp70-u:277_71: yathaivaiṣān dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathaiva śabdo niścariṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:277_73: yathā teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathaiva śabdo niścariṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:277_74: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:277_78: rātrau vā divā vā sthitānāṃ vā niṣaṇṇānāṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:277_82: tasya khalu punas tathāgatasya arhata samyaksaṃbuddhasya ye daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te sarve varṇaṃ bhāṣante.
S06adsp70-u:277_83: ye khalu punas tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti.
S06adsp70-u:277_84: sarve te niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp70-u:277_85_0: tasya khalu punas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ (AdSPG II 106)
S06adsp70-u:277_85_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya dharman deśayato na kasyacit sattvasya saṃśayo bhaviṣyaty
S06adsp70-u:277_86: tat kasya hetoḥ? yā khalu punar sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra kaścid adharmaḥ sarva sa dharmaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:277_87: tatra ye sattvā akuśalamūlagrastā anavaruptakuśalamūlā buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu vā.
S06adsp70-u:277_90: anteṣu tiṣṭhanti. ucchede śāśvate vā, te mithyāgrāheṇa gṛhītā asamyaksaṃbuddheṣu samyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddheṣu vā asamyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:277_93: te dharmaṃ pratikṣipanti, pratikṣipya kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātān narakeṣu upapadyante,
S06adsp70-u:277_94: tatra buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvān saṃsāraparyāpannān tataḥ pāpakād dṛṣṭigatān vivecayanti.
S06adsp70-u:277_97: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
S06adsp70-u:277_98: yasya pariśodhanāt sattvānāṃ na kvacin niketo bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:277_99: laukikeṣu vā dharmeṣu lokottareṣu vā dharmeṣu sāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣv anāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣu saṃskṛteṣu vā dharmeṣv asaṃskṛteṣu vā dharmeṣu,
S06adsp70-u:277_100: yāvat sarvasattvā niyatā bhavanty anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06adsp70-u:279_0: (VIII 5,16) atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:279_1: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ atha aniyataḥ?
S06adsp70-u:280_0: bhagavān āha: niyataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na aniyataḥ.
S06adsp70-u:281_1: āha: katamatra rāśau niyata. śrāvakarāśau vā pratyekabuddharāśau vā buddharāśau vā?
S06adsp70-u:282_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā niyataḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā,
S06adsp70-u:283_0: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyata utāho 'vaivartikaḥ utāho caramabhavikaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:284_0: bhagavān āha: prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyata avaivartiko niyataś caramabhaviko niyataḥ.
S06adsp70-u:285_0: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan niyato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo apāyeṣu upapadyate?
S06adsp70-u:286_0: bhagavān āha: no hīdaṃ subhūte. tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nv aṣṭamako vā srotaāpanno vā sakṛdāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā arhan vā pratyekabuddho vā apāyeṣu upapadyate?
S06adsp70-u:288_0_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya
S06adsp70-u:288_0_1: dānaṃ dadañc chīlaṃ rakṣan kṣāntyā saṃpādayan vīryaṃ vārabhamāṇaḥ samādhiṃ samāpadyamānaḥ
S06adsp70-u:288_1: maitrīkaruṇāmuditā-upekṣāṃ sarvasattveṣu bhāvayati sarva akuśaladharmaprahāṇāya tiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:288_2: so 'pāyeṣu upapadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp70-u:288_3: dīrghāyuṣkeṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp70-u:288_4: yatra vā apracāraḥ kuśaladharmāṇām eḍamūkeṣu vā janapadeṣu upapadyeta iti.
S06adsp70-u:288_5: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. dasyuṣu mleccheṣu pratyanteṣu vā janapadeṣu upapadyeta iti.
S06adsp70-u:288_6: yatra agatiś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp70-u:288_7: mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣu upapadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp70-u:288_8: tatra ca upapadyeta yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabda iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ (AdSPG II 108) vidyate.
S06adsp70-u:288_9: akriyādṛṣṭiṃ vā pated iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp70-u:288_10: api tu khalu subhūte prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitaḥ adhyāśayena,
S06adsp70-u:288_11: dasākuśalāḥ karmapathān adhyāpadyeta iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06adsp70-u:289_0: āha: yadi bhagavam bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ kuśalamūlasamanvāgataḥ yaduta apratirūpeṣu sthāneṣu nopapadyate.
S06adsp70-u:289_1: tad yāni imāni tathāgatena ātmanas tiryaggatijātakāni nirdiṣṭāni.
S06adsp70-u:289_2: imāni punas tatra kuśalamūlaṃ kva gatāni?
S06adsp70-u:290_0: bhagavān āha: na punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'śubhenakarmaṇā tiryaggatāv upadadyate.
S06adsp70-u:290_1: api tu yena yena ātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaṃs taṃ tam eva ātmabhāvaṃ saṃcintya sattvānām arthāya parigṛhṇāti.
S06adsp70-u:290_2: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte asty arhatāṃ vā pratyekabuddhānāṃ vā tad upāyakauśalaṃ yena upāyakauśalena [f.
S06adsp70-u:292_0: bhagavān āha: tathāgatasya tad upāyakauśalam asti yena tatra upapannaḥ syād.
S06adsp70-u:292_1: ye 'sya vadhāya parākramanti tān anuttarāyāṃ kṣāntau samādāpayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:292_2: teṣāṃ sattvānām eva arthāya ātmānaṃ ca parityajati.
S06adsp70-u:292_3: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viheṭhaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:292_4: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:292_5: yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayann anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye tiryagyonāv vyupapadyate.
S06adsp70-u:293_0: āha: katameṣu bhagavaṃ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imān evaṃrūpān ātmabhāvān parigṛhṇāti?
S06adsp70-u:294_0: bhagavān āha: katamaṃ subhūte kuśalo dharmo yo bodhisattvena (AdSPG II 109) mahāsattvena na paripūrayitavyāḥ? sarvakuśaladharmaparipūrir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhi.
S06adsp70-u:294_1: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇena na kaścit kuśalo dharmo yo na paripūrayitavyaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:294_2: na hi sa kaścit kuśalo dharmo yena aparipūritena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.

S06adsp70-u:321_37: na hi duḥśīlena śakyam ātmano 'py arthaḥ kartuṃ,
