S06adsp70-u:329_4: tathaiva bhagavaṃ. karma nopalabhyate. yathaiva karma nopalabhyate tathaiva karmavipāko nopalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:330_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:330_1: evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi.
S06adsp70-u:330_2: svalaksaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na karma na vipāka upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:330_3: ye punaḥ subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti te karma abhisaṃskurvanti.
S06adsp70-u:330_4: duścaritaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vā anāsravaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:330_5: te duścaritena karmaṇā triṣv apāyeṣu prapatanti.
S06adsp70-u:330_7: acchidreṇa karmaṇā rūpadhātau vā arūpyadhātau vā copapayante.
S06adsp70-u:330_8: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carann acchidracāri imān bodhisattvadharmān utpādayati.
S06adsp70-u:330_9: yān utpādya bodhyaṅgaparivārasahagataṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp70-u:330_11: yo 'rtha. kṛto na punar vipraṇaśyati. yasya vipraṇāśāt pañcagatike saṃsāre prapatet.
S06adsp70-u:331_0: aha: kiṃ punar bhagavatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāra upalabdhaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:333_0: āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatena kṛṣṇā vā śuklā vā akṛṣṇāśuklā vā dharmāḥ upalabdhāḥ?
S06adsp70-u:335_1_0: āha: yadi nopalabdhā. kuto narakā vā tiryagyonir vā yamalokā vā prajñaptāḥ kuto devamanuṣyāḥ
S06adsp70-u:335_1_1: prajñaptāḥ kutaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddhaḥ kuto bodhisattvaḥ
S06adsp70-u:336_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyāṃ. sarvadharmāṃ jānanti?
S06adsp70-u:338_0: bhagavān āha: yadi punaḥ subhūte sattvā evaṃ jānīyuḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmā iti.
S06adsp70-u:338_1: tan na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye 'saṃpratiṣṭhamāno na sattvāṃ mocayet tribhyo 'pāyebhyo yāvat saṃsāragatibhyaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:338_2: yasmāt tarhi subhūte sattvā na jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmās te aprajānanto na parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt.
S06adsp70-u:338_3: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān sattvānām arthāya anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate.
S06adsp70-u:338_4: neme dharmās tathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭā,
S06adsp70-u:338_5: tad ime sattvāḥ asataḥ asaṃvidyamānān dharmān svataḥ kalpayitvā upalabhya:
S06adsp70-u:338_7: avedanāyāṃ vedanāsaṃjñinaḥ asaṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñinaḥ asaṃskāreṣu saṃskārasaṃjñinaḥ avijñāne vijñānasaṃjñinaḥ [f.
S06adsp70-u:338_9: viparyāsair viparyastacittā. kāyena vācā manasā karma abhisaṃskurvanti.
S06adsp70-u:338_11: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sarvān antargatān kuśalān dharmān kṛtvā bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:338_12: yāṃ cārikāṃ carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
S06adsp70-u:339_0: (VIII 5,21). abhisaṃbudhya duḥkhaṃ ca duḥkhasamudayaṃ ca duḥkhanirodhaṃ ca duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ ca pratipādam ācaṣṭe (AdSPG II 119) deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:339_1: prajñapayati prasthāpayati. vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti saṃprakāśayati.
S06adsp70-u:339_2: tatra caturṣv āryasatyeṣu sarve 'ntargatā kuśalā dharmā ye kecid bodhipakṣyā dharmāyair bodhipakṣyair dharmais trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:339_4: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvāt sattvāḥ parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt.
S06adsp70-u:340_1: kiṃ punar bhagavan duḥkhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavaty atha duḥkhena,
S06adsp70-u:341_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:341_1: na subhūte duḥkhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati na duḥkhena,
S06adsp70-u:341_3: na samudayena. na duḥkhanirodhajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:341_4: na duḥkhanirodhena. na mārgajñānena parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati na mārgeṇa.
S06adsp70-u:341_5: yā punaḥ subhūte caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā tat parinirvāṇam uktaṃ mayā,
S06adsp70-u:341_7: na duḥkhena na samudayajñānena na samudayena na duḥkhanirodhajñānena na duḥkhanirodhena na mārgajñānena na mārgeṇa parinirvāṇaṃ bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:342_0: āha: katamā eṣaṃ bhagavaṃs caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā?
S06adsp70-u:343_0: bhagavān āha: yatra subhūte na duḥkhaṃ na duḥkhajñānaṃ na samudayo na samudayajñānaṃ na nirodho na nirodhajñānaṃ na mārgo na mārgajñānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:343_1: yaiṣāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ tathatā avitathatā dharmatā.
S06adsp70-u:343_3: yad utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita eva dhātur yaduta dharmadhātuḥ asaṃpramoṣāya aparihāṇāya saṃvartate.
S06adsp70-u:343_4: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhāya carati.
S06adsp70-u:344_1: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhavavantam etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:344_2: kathaṃ punar bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhāya carati.
S06adsp70-u:344_5: yathā pratividhyan naiva śrāvakabhūmau patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmau patati.
S06adsp70-u:345_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:345_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tān dharmāṃs tathā paśyati.
S06adsp70-u:345_4: satyaparyāpannāṃś ca asatyaparyāpannāñ ca tān sarvān śūnyā iti paśyati.
S06adsp70-u:345_5: sa evaṃ paśyann avakrāntaniyāmo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvagotrabhūbhūmau sthito bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:345_6: sa bodhisattvagotrabhūbhūmau sthitvā na mūrdhna nipātaṃ patati.
S06adsp70-u:345_7: yena [f. 303b] mūrdhna nipātena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati.
S06adsp70-u:345_8: sa iha bodhisattvagotrabhūmau sthitvā catvāri dhyānāny utpādayati catvāry apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattīḥ.
S06adsp70-u:345_9: sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā sarvadharmān pravicinoti.
S06adsp70-u:345_11: sa ca duḥkhañ ca parijānāti. na ca duḥkhārambaṇāṃ cittam utpādayati.
S06adsp70-u:345_12: samudayaṃ ca prajāhati. na ca samudayārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati.
S06adsp70-u:345_13: nirodhaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti. na ca nirodhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati.
S06adsp70-u:345_14: mārgaṃ ca bhāvayati na ca mārgārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati.
S06adsp70-u:345_15: anyatra bodhinimnena cittena sarvadharmān yathāvatvaṃ paśyati.
S06adsp70-u:349_0: bhagavān āha: svalaksaṇaśūnyatā. so 'nayaivaṃrūpayā vipaśyanayā sarvadharmāṃc chūnyā iti vipaśyati.
S06adsp70-u:350_0: āha: evaṃ sati bhagavann abhāvaś ca bodhiḥ?
S06adsp70-u:351_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etad. yathā vadasi. abhāvaś (AdSPG II 121) ca bodhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:351_1: sā na buddhaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na arhadbhir nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair,
S06adsp70-u:351_2: ya iha bodhāya caranti. anyatra sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti yathātvaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:351_3: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:353_2_0: te na buddhai kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na arhadbhir na anāgāmibhir na sakṛdāgāmibhir
S06adsp70-u:353_2_1: na srotaāpannair na pratipannakair nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ kṛtā ya iha
S06adsp70-u:353_3: tat kuta esān dharmāṇāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā vyavasthānaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06adsp70-u:353_4: ime nairayikā ime tairyagyonikā ime yāmalaukikā ime devā ime manuṣyāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:353_5: anena vā karmaṇā narakās tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ anena karmaṇā devāḥ anena karmaṇā manuṣyāḥ anena karmaṇā brahmakāyikā devāḥ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:353_6: anena karmaṇā srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddhāḥ anena karmaṇā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena karmaṇā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:353_7: abhāvasya hi bhagavan na kācit kriyā yayā kriyā narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamānuṣyaṃ vā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta.
S06adsp70-u:353_8: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā anuprāpnuyāt sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā,
S06adsp70-u:353_9: bodhisattvo vā mahāsattvo bodhimārge caret tathāgato vā 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ vā anuprāpnuyād yām anuprāpya sattvāṃ saṃsārāṃ mocayed.
S06adsp70-u:354_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā vadasi,
S06adsp70-u:354_1: abhāvasya hi subhūte na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:354_2: bālo hi subhūte (AdSPG II 122) aśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ āryadharmeṣv akovidaḥ abhāvasvabhāvān dharmān na prajānāti.
S06adsp70-u:354_5: yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu [f.
S06adsp70-u:354_6: 304a] deveṣu. yāvad abhāvasya na karma na kriyā na phalaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:354_7: yaḥ punar abhāvaḥ abhāva eva saḥ.
S06adsp70-u:354_8: yat punar subhūtir evam āha. abhāvasya hi na kācit kriyā yayā kriyayā yāvat srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā anuprāpnuyāt.
S06adsp70-u:354_9: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā,
S06adsp70-u:354_10: bodhisattvo vā mahāsattvo mārgākārajñatāyāñc caret tathāgato vārhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti.
S06adsp70-u:354_12_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte na abhāvo mārgaḥ abhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam
S06adsp70-u:354_12_1: abhāvo 'nāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'rhattvam abhāvaḥ pratyekabodhihr abhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
S06adsp70-u:355_0: āha: abhāvo bhagavan mārgaḥ abhāva srotaāpattiphalam abhāvaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'nāgāmiphalam abhāvo 'rhatvam abhāvaḥ pratyekabodhir abhāvo yāvat sarvākārajñatā.
S06adsp70-u:356_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte abhāvo dharmaḥ abhāvan dharmam anuprāpnoti?
S06adsp70-u:358_0: bhagavān āha: iti hi subhūte. yaś ca abhāvo yaś ca mārga ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktauv arūpiṇāv anidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇau yaduta alaksaṇau,
S06adsp70-u:358_1_0: tatra subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvāṃś
S06adsp70-u:358_1_1: caturbhir viparyāsair abhiniviṣṭāṃ pañcaskandheṣu anitye nityasaṃjñīno duḥkhe sukhasaṃjñīnaḥ
S06adsp70-u:358_2: aśubhe śubhasaṃjñīno bhāvābhiviniṣṭās tato bhāvād vivecayati.
S06adsp70-u:359_1: kaccid bhagavan vastv asti bhūtaṃ bhāvaṃs tathatā avitathatā yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā vastv ity abhiniviśante.
S06adsp70-u:359_3: (AdSPG II 123) yadi nāsti kathaṃ karma abhisaṃskurvanti.
S06adsp70-u:359_4: yena karmaṇā pañcagatikāt saṃsārān na parimucyante?
S06adsp70-u:360_0: bhagavān āha: nāsti subhūte antaśo balāgrakoṭīnikṣepamātram api vastu yatra sthitvā bālapṛthagjanā karmābhisaṃskurvanti anyatra viparyāsena.
S06adsp70-u:360_1: tena hi subhūte upamān te kariṣyāmi yāvad eva asyaivārthasya bhūyasyāmātrayā paripūraye yathāpaṇḍitājānīyuḥ.
S06adsp70-u:360_2: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit svapnadarśino vastv asti.
S06adsp70-u:360_3: yatra sthitvā svapnadarśī pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricārayet?
S06adsp70-u:361_0: āha: svapna eva tāvan nāsti. kutaḥ punaḥ svapnadarśī, tatra sthitvā pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ paricārayet.
S06adsp70-u:362_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit punar dharmo 'sti saṃskṛto vā asaṃskṛto vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā yo na svapnopamaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:363_0: āha: nāsti bhagavaṃ. kaścid dharma saṃskṛto vā asaṃskṛto vā sāsravo vā anāsravo vā yo na svapnopamaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:364_0: bhagavān āha: kaccit punaḥ svapne pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāro 'sti?
S06adsp70-u:366_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte svapne mārgabhāvanā asti,
S06adsp70-u:366_1: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
S06adsp70-u:367_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann, avastukaḥ sa bhagavan dharmaḥ aprajñaptikaḥ aprajñapanīyaḥ sarvavyāhārapadavyañjanaiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:368_0_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadā ādarśamaṇḍale pratibimban dṛśyate kaccit
S06adsp70-u:368_0_1: tasya vastv asti yat karmābhisaṃskuryāt yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet
S06adsp70-u:368_0_2: tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyān vā?
S06adsp70-u:369_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann, avastukaṃ bhagavan pratibimbaṃ anyatra bālānām ullāpakaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:369_1: tat kuto 'sya [f. 304b] karma bhavisyati. (AdSPG II 124) yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:370_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit tasya mārgabhāvanā asti.
S06adsp70-u:370_1: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
S06adsp70-u:371_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann avastukaṃś ca bhagavan pratibimbaṃ tat kuto 'sya mārgabhāvanā bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:371_1: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya na saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06adsp70-u:372_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā sā pratiśrutkā vanagahanaparvatakandaraprāgbhārato niścarati.
S06adsp70-u:372_1: kaccit tasyā pratiśrutkāyā vastv asti yat karmābhisaṃskuryāt,
S06adsp70-u:372_2: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya. narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamakokaṃ vā?
S06adsp70-u:373_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavam avastukā bhagavaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:373_1: sā pratiśrutkā kutas tasyāḥ karma bhaviṣyati.
S06adsp70-u:373_2: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta.
S06adsp70-u:374_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit tasyāḥ pratiśrutkāyā mārgabhāvanā asti:
S06adsp70-u:374_1: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
S06adsp70-u:375_0: āha: atyantatayā bhagavan saiva pratiṣrutkā nāsti.
S06adsp70-u:375_2: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06adsp70-u:376_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yeyaṃ marīcikāyām anudake udakasaṃjñā.
S06adsp70-u:376_1_0: anadyāṃ nadīsaṃjñā. anagare nagarasaṃjñā. anudyāne udyānasaṃjñā tat kiṃ tasyāṃ marīcikāyā
S06adsp70-u:376_1_1: saṃjñāyāṃ karma asti yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ
S06adsp70-u:376_1_2: vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu vā deveṣu upapadyeta?
S06adsp70-u:377_0: āha: atyantatayā bhagavaṃ marīcikāyām udakan nāsti.
S06adsp70-u:377_1: na nadī, na nagara udyānam anyatra saṃjñāviparyāsaś cakṣuṣo moha.
S06adsp70-u:377_3: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta.
S06adsp70-u:378_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaccit tasyā viparyastasaṃjñāyā mārgabhāvanā asti.
S06adsp70-u:378_1: yān mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
S06adsp70-u:379_0: āha: na bhagavan viparyastāyāḥ saṃjñāyā mārgabhāvanā asti.
S06adsp70-u:379_1: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta.
S06adsp70-u:380_1: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yāṃ māyākāro vividhān māyām abhinirminoti.
S06adsp70-u:380_2: yadi vā hastikāyaṃ yadi vā aśvakāyaṃ yadi vā balīvardakāyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:380_3: yadi vā pattikāyaṃ. yadi vā rathakāyaṃ yadi vā strikāyaṃ yadi vā puruṣakāyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:380_4: api nu tasyā māyāyā vastv asti.
S06adsp70-u:380_5: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyonir vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta.
S06adsp70-u:381_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ, na hi tasyā māyāyā vastv asty antaśo balāgrakoṭinikṣepamātram api.
S06adsp70-u:381_2: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyonir vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta.
S06adsp70-u:382_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaścit tasyā māyāyā mārgabhāvanā asti.
S06adsp70-u:382_1: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vyavadāyeta?
S06adsp70-u:384_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ punas tathāgato nirmitaṃ nirmiṇoti kaccit tasya nirmitasya vastv asti.
S06adsp70-u:384_1: yat karmābhisaṃskṛtya narakaṃ vā gacchet tiryagyonir vā yamalokaṃ vā devamanuṣyeṣu vā upapadyeta.
S06adsp70-u:385_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavann avastukaḥ sa bhagavaṃ nirmitaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:386_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte. kaccit tasya nirmitasya mārgabhāvanā asti.
S06adsp70-u:386_1: yāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya naiva saṃkliśyeta na vavadāyeta?
S06adsp70-u:388_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte kaścid atra saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā?
S06adsp70-u:390_0: bhagavān āha: yathaiva subhūte kaścin na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate tathaiva nāsti saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:390_3: na ca bhūtadarśī saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā.
S06adsp70-u:390_4: yathaiva bhūtadarśī na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate tathaiva nāsti saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:392_1: bhūtadarśī bhagavaṃ na saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate.
S06adsp70-u:392_4: abhāvasya ca bhagavaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:392_5: bhāvasya api bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam,
S06adsp70-u:392_6: svabhāvasya api bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:392_7: abhāvasvabhāvasya api bhagavan na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:392_8: tad yad etad bhagavatā vyavadānaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:393_0: bhagavān āha: yā eṣāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā tan mayoktaṃ vyavadānaṃ?
S06adsp70-u:394_0: āha: sā punaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā katamā?
S06adsp70-u:395_0: bhagavān āha: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā.
S06adsp70-u:395_1: dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ yo 'sāv utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita eva dharmasthititādhātur yaduta dharmadhātur idaṃ subhūte vyavadānaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:396_0: (VIII 5,25) āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamā.
S06adsp70-u:396_2_0: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnopameṣu sarvadharmeṣu pratiśrutkopameṣu pratibhāsopameṣu
S06adsp70-u:396_2_1: marīcyupameṣu māyopameṣu sarvadharmeṣv avastukeṣv adravyeṣv anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06adsp70-u:396_10: yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīn daśatathāgatabalāni.
S06adsp70-u:396_11: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām dhāraṇīmukhāni samādhimukhāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā.
S06adsp70-u:396_13: aśītim (AdSPG II 127) anuvyañjanāni mahābhāsaṃ pariniṣpādayati yat trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātūn avabhāsena spharati,
S06adsp70-u:396_15: yad eka svareṇa [f. 305b] daśadiglokadhātuṣu yathādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ajñāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi iti.
S06adsp70-u:397_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte na tv ete dharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamā.
S06adsp70-u:398_0: āha: yady ete bhagavan dharmāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamā.
S06adsp70-u:398_2: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06adsp70-u:398_3: na hi bhagavan svapno bhūto na yāvan nirmitaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:398_4: na hi bhagavann abhūtena śakyaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:398_5: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāvad astādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caratā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp70-u:399_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. na hy abhūtena śakyaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā.
S06adsp70-u:399_2: yāvad aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caratā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ.
S06adsp70-u:399_4: na hi śakyam abhisaṇiṣkṛtair abhisaṃcetayitair dharmaiḥ sarvākārajñatām (AdSPG II 128) anuprāptuṃ.
S06adsp70-u:399_5: api tu khalu subhūte sarva ete dharmā mārgāharaṇatāya saṃvartante mārgotpādāya na puna phalasya adhigamāya,
S06adsp70-u:399_6: ya eṣāṃ dharmāṇām anutpāda aprādurbhāva alakṣaṇo 'pi saḥ.
S06adsp70-u:399_7: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat tam eva kuśalan dharmam ārabhate.
S06adsp70-u:399_8: yadi vā dānapāramitāṃ yadi vā śīlapāramitāṃ yadi vā kṣāntipāramitāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:399_9: yadi vā vīryapāramitāṃ yadi vā dhyānapāramitāṃ yadi vā prajñāpāramitāṃ yadi vā dhyānāni yadi vā apramāṇāni yadi vā ārūpyasamāpattīr yadi vā smṛtyupasthānāni yāvan mārgaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:399_11: yadi vā vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattī yadi vā yāvad āveṇikabuddhadharmān.
S06adsp70-u:399_13_0: na śakyam imān dharmān aparipūrya dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ
S06adsp70-u:399_13_1: dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān aparipūrya sattvān
S06adsp70-u:399_14: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yaṃ yam eva kuśalan dharmam ārabhate sarvaṃ taṃ svapnopamaṃ jānāti.
S06adsp70-u:399_15: yāvan nirmitopamaṃ jānāti. sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ svapnopamāṃ jānāti.
S06adsp70-u:399_16: yāvan nirmitopamāṃ jānāti. te sarvasattvā svapne caranti iti jānāti.
S06adsp70-u:399_23: agrāhyā ca prajñāpāramitā. agrāhyā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.
S06adsp70-u:399_24: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva agrāhyāḥ sarvadharmā iti viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayati.
S06adsp70-u:399_25: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy agrāhyāḥ sarvadharmā avastukāḥ svapnopamāḥ yāvan nirmitopamā,
S06adsp70-u:399_26: na ca agrāhyeṇa. [f. 306a] dharmeṇa agrāhyo dharmaḥ śakyam anuprāptuṃ,
S06adsp70-u:399_27: anyatra sattvā imān dharmān na jānanti na paśyanti.
S06adsp70-u:399_28: (AdSPG II 129) tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvasattvānām arthāya anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate,
S06adsp70-u:399_29: sa ca prathamacittotpādam upādāya yad dānaṃ dadāti.
S06adsp70-u:399_30: tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte. yac chīlaṃ rakṣati yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati yan vīryam ārabhate yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayati tat sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte,
S06adsp70-u:399_31: na punar ātmārthaṃ, na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyasya kṛte 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhate 'nyatra sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte,
S06adsp70-u:399_32: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye asattve sattvasaṃjñayā sthitās anātmāny ātmasaṃjñayā sthitā evaṃ jantumanujamānavapoṣapudgalakārakakārāpakasamutthāpakavedakavedayitriṣu.
S06adsp70-u:399_33: yāvad ajānake jānakasaṃjñayā sthitā apaśyake paśyakasaṃjñayā sthitās tāṃ viparyāsān vivecayati.
S06adsp70-u:399_37: sa sarvāṇi imāni nimiñjitamanyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tyaktvā amanyamānena cetasā bahulam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06adsp70-u:399_38: anena subhūte upāyena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann ātmanā ca na kvacid dharme 'bhiniviśate.
S06adsp70-u:400_1: kiṃ punaḥ sa lokavyavahāreṇa abhisaṃbuddhaḥ utaḥ paramārthena?
S06adsp70-u:401_0: bhagavān āha: lokavyavahāreṇa vyavahṛyate. ayaṃ tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti.
S06adsp70-u:401_3: tat kasya hetor? upalaṃbho hy eṣa yaduta anena dharmeṇa ayan dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti.
S06adsp70-u:401_4: na ca dvayena kācit prāptir na abhisamaya.
S06adsp70-u:402_0: āha: yadi bhagavan na dvayena prāptir abhisamayaś ca, kiṃ punar advayena prāptir abhisamayaś ca?
S06adsp70-u:403_0: bhagavān āha: na dvayena prāptir na abhisamayo na advayena prāptir abhisamayaś ca,
S06adsp70-u:403_2: yatra na dvayaṃ na advayaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ? prapañca eṣa yadaiṣa prāptir eso 'bhisamaya.
S06adsp70-u:404_1: āha: abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ kā dharmasamatā?
S06adsp70-u:405_0: bhagavān āha: eṣaivātra dharmasamatā yatra na bhāvo na abhāvo na svabhāvo na parikīrtanā,
S06adsp70-u:405_2: na ca anyaḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate dharmasamatāyāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:405_4: agatir aviṣayo dharmasamatā. kasyacid bālasya vā āryasya vā.
S06adsp70-u:406_0: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ dharmasamatā. tathāgatasya apy aviṣayaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:407_0: bhagavān āha: aviṣayaḥ subhūte. dharmasamatā. sarvāryāṇāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ vā sakṛdāgāmināṃ vā anāgāmināṃ vā.
S06adsp70-u:408_0: āha: na punar bhagavaṃ sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavarttī tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:409_0: bhagavān āha: syāt sarvadharmaviṣayavaśavarttī tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho,
S06adsp70-u:409_1: yady anyā dharmasamatā syād anyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho,
S06adsp70-u:409_2_0: yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanānāṃ dharmasamatā yā ca srotaāpannānāṃ yā ca sakṛdāgāmināṃ
S06adsp70-u:409_2_1: yā ca anāgāmināṃ yā ca arhatāṃ yā ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ yā ca bodhisattvānāṃ yā ca
S06adsp70-u:409_4: yā ca pṛthagjanānāṃ samatā yā ca sarvāryāṇāṃ samatā ekasamatā sā,
S06adsp70-u:409_5: naikasamatāyāṃ dvayam asty ayaṃ pṛthagjano 'yaṃ yāvat tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti.
S06adsp70-u:410_0: āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante.
S06adsp70-u:410_1: ayaṃ pṛthagjano 'yaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddhaḥ ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:410_3: pṛthagjanānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ ca sakṛdāgāmināṃ ca anāgāmināṃ ca arhatāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ ca arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:411_0: bhagavān āha: evam eta subhūte evam etad. aviśeṣaḥ sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ (AdSPG II 131) pṛthagjanānāṃ yāvat tathāgatānāṃ ca arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:412_0: āha: yadi bhagavann aviśeṣaḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ yāvat tathāgatānāṃ ca arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ,
S06adsp70-u:412_1: tat kuta eṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:413_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte anyad buddharatnam anyad dharmaratnam anyat saṃgharatnam anyā dharmasamatā?
S06adsp70-u:414_0: āha: yathā ahaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasya artham ājānāmi na anyad buddharatnam anyad dharmaratnam anyat saṃgharatnam anyā dharmasamatā.
S06adsp70-u:414_1: yad eva bhagavaṃ buddharatnaṃ yad eva dharmaratnaṃ yad eva saṃgharatnaṃ saiva dharmasamatā,
S06adsp70-u:414_2: sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalaksaṇā.
S06adsp70-u:414_3_0: yaduta alakṣaṇās, tat punar kathaṃ bhagavan eṣām alakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ
S06adsp70-u:414_3_1: karoty ayaṃ pṛthagjano ayaṃ srotaāpannaḥ ayaṃ sakṛdāgāmī ayam anāgāmī ayam arhann
S06adsp70-u:414_3_2: ayaṃ pratyekabuddhaḥ ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:415_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, tathāgatasyaiṣa viṣayaḥ tathāgatasyaiṣa puruṣakāro yad alaksaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:415_1: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhiṃ na abhisaṃbhotsyata.
S06adsp70-u:415_3: api nu narakā vā prajñāsyante tiryagyonir vā yamaloka vā.
S06adsp70-u:415_4_0: devā vā manuṣyā vā. cāturmahārājakāyikā vā yāvat paranirmitavaśavarttino vā brahmakāyikā
S06adsp70-u:415_4_1: vā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattir vā smṛtyupasthānāni vā yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgo
S06adsp70-u:415_4_2: mārgaḥ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattaya adhyātmaśūnyatā
S06adsp70-u:415_5: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāsyante?
S06adsp70-u:417_1: bhagavān āha: tasmāt tarhi subhūte tathāgatasyaiṣa puruṣakāro yo dharmasamatāyā ca na calati dharmāṇāṃ ca vyavasthānaṃ karoti.
S06adsp70-u:418_0: āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃ yathā caiva tathāgato dharmasamatāyāś ca na calati.
S06adsp70-u:419_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat. sarvadharmā subhūte dharmasamatāyā na calanti.
S06adsp70-u:419_1: na vivantante. tat kasya hetoḥ? yaiva tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir,
S06adsp70-u:419_3: saiva śraddhānusāriṇāṃ dharmānuṣāriṇām aṣṭamakānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ yāvad bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathatā yāvad bhūtakoṭir.
S06adsp70-u:419_4: sarva ete dharmā dharmasamatāṃ na vyativarttante.
S06adsp70-u:419_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yā teṣāṃ tathatā yāvad bhūtakoṭi nānyā teṣāṃ dharmasamatāyā.
S06adsp70-u:420_0_0: āha: yadi bhagavan yaiva dharmasamatā pṛthagjanānāṃ saiva srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām
S06adsp70-u:420_0_1: anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saiva dharmasamatā tathāgatānām
S06adsp70-u:420_1: ya ime bhagavaṃ vilakṣaṇās dharmās tadyathedaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:420_2: anyā rūpasya dharmatā anyā vedanāyā anyā saṃjñāyā anyā saṃskārāṇām anyā vijñānasya anyā cakṣuṣo dharmatā anyā srotrasya anyā ghrāṇasya anyā jivhāyā anyā kāyasya anyā manasaḥ,

S06adsp70-u:420_3_1: anyā vijñānadhātor anyā rāgasya dharmatā anyā dveṣasya anyā mohasya anyā dṛṣṭikṛtānām

S06adsp70-u:420_4_0: kathaṃ bhagavann evaṃ vilaksaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā ekalakṣaṇā bhavati? kathaṃ
S06adsp70-u:420_4_1: punar dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati? kutra vyavasthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:420_4_2: caran dharmāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ karoti? na ca akṛtvā dharmanānātvaṃ śakyaṃ bodhisattvena
S06adsp70-u:420_5: kathaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūmer bhūmiṃ saṃkrāmati nyāmaṃ ca avakrāmati.
S06adsp70-u:420_8_0: yābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍamāno dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayec chīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ

S06adsp70-u:421_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:421_1_0: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha. yadi yaiva sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatā saiva pṛthagjanānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:421_1_1: dharmasamatā saiva srotaāpannānāṃ dharmasamatā yāvat saiva tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:421_2: vilaksaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasamatā katham ekalakṣaṇā yukteti? tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā rūpasya [f.
S06adsp70-u:421_4: yā tathāgatānāṃ dharmatā nanu śūnyataiva sā?
S06adsp70-u:423_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte śūnyatāyāṃ vilakṣaṇā dharmā upalabhyante,
S06adsp70-u:423_1: yat rūpasya vilaksaṇaṃ vedanāyā saṃjñāyā yat saṃskārāṇāṃ yad vijñānasya yāvad yat tathāgatasya lakṣaṇaṃ?
S06adsp70-u:425_0: bhagavān āha: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:425_1: yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tatra na pṛthagjanā nānyatra pṛthagjanena.
S06adsp70-u:426_0: (VIII 5,26) āha: kiṃ punar eṣā dharmatā saṃskṛtā atha asaṃskṛtā?
S06adsp70-u:427_0: bhagavān āha: na saṃskṛtā na asaṃskṛtā, na ca saṃskṛta. vyatirikeṇa (AdSPG II 134) asaṃskṛtaṃ labhyate.
S06adsp70-u:427_2: iti hi subhūte yaś ca saṃskṛtadhātur yaś ca asaṃskṛtadhātur ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv arūpiṇāv nidarśanāv apratighāv ekalakṣaṇau yaduta alakṣaṇau,
S06adsp70-u:427_4: na punaḥ paramārthena. na ca paramārthe kaścit kāyasaṃskāro vāksaṃskāro vā manaḥsaṃskāro vā.
S06adsp70-u:427_5: na ca anyatra kāyasaṃskārān na anyatra vāksaṃskārān na anyatra manaḥsaṃskārāt paramārtha upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:427_6: yaiṣān dharmāṇāṃ saṃskṛta asaṃskṛtānāṃ samatā sa paramārthaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:427_7: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paramārthā ca na calati.
S06adsp70-u:429_2: tan na kasyacid dharmasya kiṃcit karoti.
S06adsp70-u:429_3: ākiṃcaneṣu vā niṣkiṃcaneṣu vā dharmeṣu kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran paramārthāc ca na calati.
S06adsp70-u:430_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat tathā yathā bhāṣase.
S06adsp70-u:430_1: yac chūnyatā na sā kasyacit kiṃcit karoti.
S06adsp70-u:430_2: nākiṃcit. yadi subhūte ye te sattvāḥ svayam eva śūnyatāṃ jānīyur neyan tathāgatasya tathāgatavṛṣabhitā bhavet.
S06adsp70-u:430_4: sattvāṃś ca ātmasaṃjñāyā vivecayati vivecya śūnyatāyā mocayati saṃsārāt.
S06adsp70-u:430_5_0: evaṃ sattvasaṃjñāyā yāvat kārakasaṃjñāyā rūpasaṃjñāyā yāvad vijñānasaṃjñāyā cakṣuḥsaṃjñāyā
S06adsp70-u:430_5_1: yāvan manaḥsaṃjñāyā pṛthivīdhātusaṃjñāyā yāvad vijñānadhātusaṃjñāyā saṃskṛtadhātusaṃjñāyā
S06adsp70-u:432_0: bhagavān āha: sarvasaṃjñābhiḥ śūnyaḥ. api tu khalu subhūte yo nirmito 'nyan nirmitaṃ nirmīyeta api nu tasya kiṃcid vastv asti yan na śūnyatā?
S06adsp70-u:433_0: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavaṃ yan na nirmitasya.
S06adsp70-u:433_1: kiṃcid vastv asti yan na śūnyatā.
S06adsp70-u:433_2: yā ca śūnyatā yaś ca nirmita ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktāv ubhāv etau śūnyatāyā śūnyau.
S06adsp70-u:433_3: tat kiṃ vinigūhitam iyaṃ śūnyatā ayaṃ nirmitaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:433_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathāpy ubhayam etac chūnyatāyāṃ nopalabhyante iyaṃ śūnyatā ayaṃ nirmita iti.
S06adsp70-u:434_0: bhagavān āha: nāsti subhūte rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā yāvan nirmitaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:435_0: āha: yadi bhagavann ime laukikā dharmā nirmitā,
S06adsp70-u:435_1: api nv ime lokottarā dharmāḥ nirmitā yaduta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvān samyakprahāṇāni.
S06adsp70-u:435_2_0: catvārardhipādā. pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni. [f. 308a] /// trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni daśatathāgatabalāni
S06adsp70-u:435_2_1: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇika
S06adsp70-u:435_3: teṣāṃ ca phalaṃ yena teṣāṃ pudgalānāṃ prajñaptiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:435_4: srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmy anāgāmy arhan pratyekabuddhaḥs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ api nv ime dharmā nirmitā?
S06adsp70-u:436_0: bhagavān āha: yat punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmā nirmitā,
S06adsp70-u:436_1: tatra kaścic chrāvaka nirmitaḥ kaścit pratyekabuddha nirmitaḥ kaścid bodhisattva nirmitaḥ kaścit tathāgata nirmitaḥ kaścit kleśa nirmitaḥ (AdSPG II 136) kaścit karma nirmitaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:437_0: āha: yat punar idaṃ bhagavan prahāṇaṃ.
S06adsp70-u:437_2: api nv ete dharmā. nirmitāḥ, pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā buddhabhūmir vā sarvavāsanānusandhiprahāṇāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:438_0: bhagavān āha: kecit subhūte dharmā, uṭṭhāpitā vā nirodhitā vā, sarve 'te nirmitā.
S06adsp70-u:439_0: āha: katamo bhagavan dharmo yo na nirmitaḥ?
S06adsp70-u:440_0: bhagavān āha: yasya notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa na nirmitaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:442_0: bhagavān āha: asaṃmoṣadharmanirvāṇasamayaṃ dharmo na nirmitaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:443_0: āha: yat punar bhagavatoktaṃ śūnyatāyāś ca na calati.
S06adsp70-u:443_1: na ca dvayenopalabhyate na ca kaścid dharmo yo na śūnyatā.
S06adsp70-u:444_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, sarvadharmāḥ subhūte svabhāvaśūnyāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:444_1: te na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kṛtāḥ,
S06adsp70-u:445_0: subhūtir āha: ādikarmiko bhagavaṃ pudgalaḥ katham avavaditavyaḥ katham anuśātivyaḥ yat svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ jānīyāt?
S06adsp70-u:446_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte pūrvaṃ bhāvo 'bhūt paścād abhāvo bhaviṣyati iti.
S06adsp70-u:446_1: nātra subhūte bhāvo na abhāvo na svabhāvo na parabhāvaḥ.
